I ordered this dress in grey as my bridesmaid's dress for my best friend's wedding in August, and I'm beyond pleased with the quality, cut, and color- and not to mention how fabulous it looks on. I'm 5'7" and about 125 so I ordered the small size. It fits perfect in all the right places. The length is perfect, as I needed a bridesmaids dress that would be knee length. The material is a soft and thick silky material. It's not see-through, so no worries there. Obviously, it is form fitting, so beware of panty lines.

The way this dress is cut is extremely flattering. I was concerned about this because I wanted a dress that I would love wearing all day and night for the wedding and pictures, and still want to wear in the future for other occasions. Definitely no worries there, as this dress has become one of my favorite items in my closet! For ladies who are concerned about how this dress looks on, I highly recommend taking a chance. It's flattering even though it's form-fitting. I believe the way the material is ruched makes for a perfect looking figure regardless of one's size or height.

Overall, I just really love this dress. I recommend it for any occasion; wedding, date night, formal event.

This is from their description for Triple XL - US L/TAG3XL--Shoulder: 19.09 , Bust: 44.09 , Length: 36.02 , Sleeve: 25.20.  This description is NOT correct.  This size supposedly is equivalent to a size Large or even extra Large according to the initial description of 1 to 2 size smaller than US sizes.

I purchased this for my son who wears a 40 jacket.  The coat was way tight around the torso and the sleeves ended about half way up his forearm???!  I don't know but they must have midgets over where they make this coat.

The coat ended up with my youngest son who is 13 YO and wears a men's size SMALL!  CRAZY!  So an Asian 3XL is equivalent to a US size SMALL???!  Wow!  Just wow!  This coat is made for midgets.

I'll cut to the chase and then go into detail: the sizes are even smaller than listed.

I purchased the XXL because the sizing picture said that would be a US large. The coat is at best a women's US large. For any normal sized NON-Asian male, this is a medium, and that's only if you wear a t-shirt under it. Don't expect to wear anything bulky.

Here's whwt really irritwtes me: This company guarantees returns for anything EXCEPT size issues. That indicates that they have had a lot of complaints and are avoiding returning people's money. If you want to pay for shipping to china, they'll let you. Well, thanks.

These are the reasons for the 3 star review. It's a shame, because the item is very nice and the service was prompt. But it's quite clear they have had complaints and just don't want to have to pay anyone back. Hoenstly, if they had an American XL (which would've been a large) I'd have paid to have it exchanged.

If you are a very slim western male with no muscle mass and saggy shoulders, OR you are asian, this coat might fit you as described. But don't waste your time otherwise.

reviewText:
These panties are black with a sewn in white liner on the backside. However the liner is paper thin. There is very little difference between these and regular panties. I am very skeptical as to how well they will hold up during a period. I will update my review when I see how well they perform under pressure.
**updated review**
After using these panties for a few months I am happy to update my review and say they exceeded my previous expectations. My child has had no leaks or break-through bleeding issues, even over-night. These are to be worn in conjunction with sanitary napkins. The one down-side is the size. I bought the largest size for my eleven year old (she is a tall girl), and they are almost too small. The size in not comparable to USA girls panties sizing.

reviewText: I was really skeptical about purchasing this jacket after reading so many different opinions on the sizes. I decided to heed the warnings of the other reviewers and went two sizes up to a Large. It's just a little bit big, especially in the sleeves. But it looks fine and allows me to move easily with the collared shirt and belts on underneath. I am glad that it arrived in time for a convention! I ordered this on March 15 (I needed it by April 11) and it said it wouldn't come until April 24. But it ended up arriving March 29 so WAY before!! Absolutely no tracking information though. The colors look great on mine and are printed just fine. It had a few hanging strings, but cut them off and it looks awesome! I would definitely order again, but only go one size up instead of two! It's perfect for the price!

This jacket was amazing, very little was negative about it. There was a few little threads lose here and there, but nothing a few minutes of cutting them off could fix, and it was a little bit tight around the shoulders. Now off to kill more Titans!!

This is not a high-quality item. When I received it, there were a few strings hanging that I needed to snip off. The left pocket also had a 3-inch hole that I had to sew shut.

Despite being featured in one of Amazon's lists (beautiful things, December 2015), the product was on back order directly from China, and I had to pay for expedited shipping or I was going to have to wait upwards of a month to receive it.

That said, now that it's here, and now that I've taken care of the strings and holes, its a pretty good-looking and warm coat. I don't expect it will last more than two or three seasons though.

Pros:

* It is small and inconspicuous;
* It is inexpensive;
* It mostly looks like the picture (e.g., the metal is all one color and NOT two-toned); and,
* The chain it comes on is pretty long and, therefore, does not show above the neckline.

Cons:

* The battery that came with it, as in inside of it, was already dead. Thus, the first thing I had to do was go out and buy a battery; and,
* When I took the back off to get the battery out, the entire clock face and inner workings fell out and were a tad difficult to get back into place.

All in all, I'm pleased with my cute little owl clock, because now I don't need a watch or to carry my cell phone for it's clock function. Plus, I love owls and this was quite inexpensive.
summary: Pros and Cons ... but still love my little owl "clock".

reviewText:
This is a nice looking ring, and I was very happy when I got it.  Unfortunately, it scratched very easily, and one of the reasons I bought it was that tungsten was supposed to be hard to scratch.  Within two weeks it had picked up some pretty serious marks.  There was no abuse involved, just everyday wear.

On a logistics front, the little blue diamond looked nice, but since I have relatively large knuckles it was a bit loose, and the diamond always seemed to be off to one side and not visible.  If it fits snugly it wouldn't be an issue, but that was my experience.

I contacted the seller and they were great about an exchange, so I now have one of their black porcelain rings and it seems to be much more durable, though only time will tell. It's has no particular orientation, so when it spins around it doesn't matter.
summary: Nice looking ring, but with some issues.

reviewText: I absolutely love this wallet. I bought it because all the women's wallets were going to be to big and bulky. It fits well in my purse and keeps my cards and cash organized. I can even keep my check book in it. My purse zips with the wallet and my phone. So happy!
Very bulky. Returned

This ring replaced my Kay Jewelry piece of junk that charged my husband a fortune!!  Every time I wore this "custom" junk designed and overpriced to the moon, I would catch the prongs holding the center stone on the first thing I touched!  So, I only wear my wedding set on very special occasions.  With that being said, this is the BEST replacement, and I have received SO many complements on it.  It is gorgeous in the light, but what is so great is the wide 8 mm band that is so comfortable due to the bevel on the inside.  I purchased this ring after purchasing him a replacement band that he lost fishing from the same company (or related).  The price was 1/2 of what I paid for his original black tungsten band, and his new band is similar to this one, except it has the inlaid mother of pearl.  His and my ring both are tough & durable, a steal of a deal for the unique piece of art, and is under a lifetime warranty - even to resize! (which is basically replacing it, because tungsten cannot be sized).  That's a great company and you'll get compliments, believe me.  check out the pics!
summary: A GORGEOUS WEDDING BAND - SO COMFORTABLE AT 8 MM WIDE! QUALITY 100%

Soft and easily shaped, it is lightweight enough to wear in the fall, winter and into spring both inside as a fashion accessory and outside as a neck warmer. I look forward to wearing this out shopping once back to school rolls around.
I received this scarf at a discount in exchange for my honest review. The thoughts and feelings expressed above are my own from my own experience. I hope that my review is helpful to others who are also considering purchasing this.

reviewText:
The contrast of blues and oranges are what drew me to this scarf. Simply gorgeous colors, perfect for Autumn weather. The bold and subtle Bohemian patterns blend beautifully together. The truly wonderful thing about this piece is how versatile it is. The length is perfect so that I can wear it in many different styles as a scarf, or also as a shawl. It is very sheer, with a noticeably soft texture. As someone who has sensitive skin, I'm careful about the types of materials I wear, but the fabric is super soft and in no way itchy or irritating. The lightweight material will not weigh you down, yet still provides enough warmth for the chilly Autumn and Winter months.

I'm very happy with my purchase so far, I love it! Its my new little Bohemian free spirit accessory. The colors and and patterns give a nice little extra pop to my outfits. I do want to point out that upon close inspection of this item, I noticed some of the stitching was a bit off with random stray threads.
This is a great light weight scarf.  The pattern is very 70's (which is my style).  It is long enough to wear multiple ways.  I see this as a staple of my fall wardrobe.
summary: This is a great light weight scarf

reviewText: I bought the red and it is I would describe, a brownish red, not too bright and flashy.  Holds a ton. Has a nice leather smell. The inside is fabric is like the fabric you have on the inside of a jacket - substantial and a little slick. It should last. I use the handles for hand carrying and for shoulder carrying. It stays up on the shoulder nicely.  A little bigger than I thought it would be but that's OK. The strap that comes with it is leather on the outside and fabric on the inside.  I did try it once and I felt the strap was more comfortable on the shoulder with the fabric than a leather strap.  Great price for a well made product.  Didn't give it the 5th star because it is non-structured on the bottom.  When you set it down it slouches to the side. That is a preferential thing; I like the bag to sit up when I set it down.

This purchase was the first time I have ever ordered a purse from Amazon, and I was hesitant to do so, but I had such a difficult time finding a nice red purse that I decided to go for it.  I LOVE this bag, and I am very picky when it comes to purses.  The leather is nice and the bag is constructed well.  I have a habit of carrying purses that are far too large and then filling them with assorted items.  This bag is the perfect size and holds everything you need without being bulky.  The inside design helps keep your items organized and even though the bag isn't particularly deep, the design of the bag keeps your items inside hidden even when the zipper is left open.  The bag itself is light so there isn't considerable weight added to the items you are carrying.  I will definitely purchase from this brand again (I'm hoping for new spring/summer colors) and I hope all the bags from this company are as high quality as this one!!

Overall, it's a decent bag with good functionality.  The bag is little on the heavy side even empty.  The goldtone accessories make the bag look tacky.  To save cost, the buckles on handles in the front and back are different.  Only the front handle has the decorated design and not the back. I've never seen this even in the cheaper handbags.

reviewText: Love this shirt, great fit! I usually pair with a funky bralette and it looks cute. I'm typically a small or medium in shirts.

I just received my package today--two days earlier than expected--and I wanted to write my initial thoughts of the bodysuit/romper so far.  I will update this review as I get more wear out of it. Pictures will be added later!

For reference, I am 5'5, 115 lbs, and 30C; I ordered a Medium instead of a Small based on the size guide in the description of this product (I HIGHLY recommend doing this when purchasing from a retailer you're unfamiliar with and who produce in other countries). I found that ordering a Medium instead of a Small was the PERFECT fit for my body type. Specifically in the bum department. So many rompers are too short for me and you can see too much booty for me to be comfortable walking around in.  Some things to note about the romper:

-The straps are somewhat removable. Think of those bras that can convert into racer-backs and that's exactly what this outfit can do. It's designed to have the straps going racer and tank style to keep the large back gap as "closed" as possible. Though you can go full tank style or full racer, however, it will make the opening on the back billow much more.

- There's this weird pointed edges right next to the loops where you can remove the straps. It's where the clothing was hemmed I think and I think it's too thick for the seamstress or sowing machines to attach the loops there. I wish they did because it would have made the back more ascetically pleasing. It's kind of noticeable and this kind of bothers me which is why I knocked off a star.

-It's definitely a linen-like material which for me means it will need special care in the washer. Cold wash and air dry--no dryer unless you don't use heat.  I've only seen myself in this romper at night and in artificial light, but I'd have to say it's semi-see through. A backless bra or pasties or no bra (Go you!) will work just fine with this outfit.

Overall, I'm pleasantly surprised that this romper fit! I'm excited to wear this out this summer. I love the back and how open it is. This romper is very roomy, but modest -- in the front. ;) As of right now, I highly recommend this to those looking for a summer romper or cover-up that also fully covers their bum!

**I was NOT paid or discounted this item. I bought this item with my own money. All opinions written here are solely my own.**
summary: Pleasantly Surprised! But Some Surprises from the Outfit Itself...

reviewText:
I'm so glad I bought this top. Great for daytime or night out wear. I love the deep V appeal in the front and the back and I can wear a regular bra with it and it will not show. For reference, I bought a size M. I am 5'9, 34B, 130lbs. Good quality solid material, not see through or sheer.

My only con is that the bottom material wrinkles easy--it's like a polyester cotton blend. Nothing a little steaming or ironing can't fix, however, I don't know if I would wear this somewhere if I know I'll be sitting down for a period of time due to the risk of it getting bunched up and wrinkled.
summary: So glad I bought this top

reviewText: thought it would be a little warmer

I am SO confused by this coat. I really love this Threesixty360 Womens Classic Toggle Duffle Pea Check Hood with Coat, but as you can see in the video it is WAY TOO SMALL! The video includes first a look at the coat by itself and then a look at the coat on me. You'll see why I love it and why I'm so disappointed in the sizing. (In the very beginning of the video I said I chose a size medium, but I completely misspoke as I actually had ordered & received & was wearing an extra large!) I harp on the sizing in this written portion, but the video shows you all the great details about this coat that you don't want to miss if you can fit into it! Just for starters, the zipper closure goes to the neck which is fabulous! I always follow the guidelines put up by a seller for sizing and this one was way off. If you look in the product photo area, there is a size chart and for the size I chose the largest available: XL and I was within parameters of the measurements given; they also said XL is comparable to size 16 to 18 which would be correct for me. For the black coat I was offered for review, I was not given the option of an XXL which might possibly have fit me better. I look like a stuffed sausage wearing this coat. They included a thin blue shell that you can see me wearing in the video. I felt it was extremely inappropriate to wear by the blue shell by itself as it is paper thin which is why I was hiding behind the coat in the video.. Since creating the video, I have since wondered if the seller's idea of a pea coat and mine are different as it is clearly made outside of the US. I see coats as something to put over clothes to keep warm. Maybe they see this as a fashion statement and not meant to be taken off? I highly recommend you measure yourself over a set of clothes you want to wear underneath this coat for correct sizing! And keep in mind that this coat is a coat for Autumn or Spring- not for winter. It is so thin I'm sure the windy city would freeze me if it had fit and had I worn it out and about in Winter! I did not know what "duffle" meant in the name of the coat and so I looked on amazon to see if there were other duffle coats to understand if this contributed to my misunderstanding of how this coat would fit. In the video, you can see that the tags do not match the name Threexisty360. And I happened to find a coat with the same description as this one-looks very similar except hood lining is a different color and it has the same tags (with the same brand name) as is on my coat! You can see it here in a slightly different color: Meaneor Women's Classic Toggle Duffle Pea Coat with Hood Wine Red XXL I saw they had XXL which might've fit me better unless they were going on different size chart. Anyhow-it is interesting information to have. I LOVE the look of this coat and feel SO frustrated that perhaps there is something that has been lost in translation as this coat was never meant to fit over clothes as . I received this product at a discount for my honest and unbiased opinion. However! I am not happy to have paid the money I did to have the coat not fit. I would be horrified if I were to pay the full price asked for and do not recommend you buy this coat at full price. I am going to donate this coat in hopes someone else can fit into it and enjoy it. Three stars because it did not fit even though it has a lot of potential and is really cute. If you have any comments or questions, I welcome them!
summary: Video Shows Details of this Great Coat! Too bad I look like a stuffed sausage in it! The sizing chart is way off! SIZE WAY UP!

reviewText: Had this fit it would have been awesome. It was a bit thinner than expected, but nice, soft and well put together! I'm very broad in the shoulders with thicker arms, so sadly it was too small and I have to return it.
This coat/fabric is not what I expected. It was expensive and came fitting way too small and if bad quality. I was going to return it and it got lost in a move.

The product was very small.  I would say order 2-3 sizes up.  It was very thin also.  The construction of the coat was good if your looking for a lightweight spring jacket this would be okay for 60+ degree weather.  I was not satisfied with my purchase and did return it for a refund.  I received this product discounted in return for my honest review.

I purchased this jacket in a size medium and in the gray color.  I'm 5'10" and 135 lbs. I wear a larger small/smaller medium and typically choose a medium.

I think the important thing is to bear in mind that the product description specifically says "COLOUR SHADES MAY VARY FROM THE PICTURE, MATERIALS MAY VARY DEPENDING ON SUPPLIERS ,SIZES VARY DEPENDING ON BODY SIZE."  So with that....

Color: The gray I received is MUCH lighter than the picture. I imagine you'd have less of an issue if you purchased black.  I do like it, though, but that's something to consider if going for the gray or wine color.  Personally, I needed something other than a black jacket.

Materials: There is no label, so I'm not sure if the materials in the listing are what I received  The outer material feels like a fleece, but without all the stretch.  The inner lining is your typical jacket inner lining, and the hood is a faux sheepskin like material.  Overall, it feels cheaper than a $199 list jacket (per the Amazon list price).

Size: This is my biggest issue with this jacket.  As I mentioned earlier, I purchased a medium.  The tag on the jacket indicates I received a large.  A large would normally be huge on me, but I'm glad I got a large--even that was tight. It's very fitted, and I definitely couldn't wear anything bulky underneath! If you choose to purchase this, size up, then size up again.  Consider going one more if you ever want to wear a sweater! However, I'm not sure if the medium I ordered is a large based on the origin outside of US sizing, so it's really hard to say whether or not the size I received was a mistake.

Just to add some things not fully mentioned--the jacket zips up to close, and has three cute, oversized buttons which add a fun detail. It also has two pockets in the front.  It also has a hood. I do like the style, and think it's a good looking jacket.  It's not super thick, and is good for fall where I live (Michigan), but is definitely not a winter jacket.

I received this jacket at a discounted rate of $39.99 in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are 100% my own.  I do feel this jacket is worth the value I paid, though I would have been disappointed at the full price.  I also want to comment on the packaging--this came with a sheer tank (mine was in yellow), a cute polka dot hair tie with a knot/bow, and a regular hair tie with a charm.  I do appreciate extras, and think that's a nice thing from the seller.  However, I'm not sure if these are the norm or because of my agreement to review.

The dark grey color is actually a very light gray, but everything came as expected (buttons, pockets, zipper). A very cozy coat that I will enjoy using this winter. My package also came with a thin blue shirt and hairbands bow. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
summary: A very cozy coat that I will enjoy using this winter

I was so excited about this sweater when I ordered it. It took a while to arrive, but showed up more than two weeks earlier than it's projected arrival date, so that was a plus. The colors are true to the photo which I like. I am normally a medium in size but since some of the other reviewers mentioned the item running just a little on the small side in the arms, I ordered a Large. I'm tall 5'8" and I wanted to make sure it would be long enough to cover my backside and that the sleeves wouldn't hit me in a weird spot. The large fits perfectly. It fits me much like the sweater fits the gal in the photo, mine is perhaps a bit longer but I prefer that. Over all, the color, size and fit are exactly what I wanted and the one time I have worn it I received lots of compliments.

The CONS of the item however are what make me not want to recommend it. I wouldn't in anyway call this item a sweater. The fabric it is made from is so incredibly thin and poor quality it's unbelievable. as a comparison, for those who sew, it feels similar to very cheap facing. You can easily see thru it if you are not wearing it, and there were a couple of lose threads of another color embedded in the weave  (if you want to call it a weave) in one spot on the garment. I have purchased higher quality items at the local dollar store.

Bottom line, if you aren't looking for any kind of warmth, or quality and are just going for look, this item does look like the photo. People can't really tell it's poor quality just from looking at it, but the wearer will not be able to miss the fact. It was a cheap item to begin with so I wasn't expecting top quality to begin with, but fir the price you could easily find something of much high quality at a Walmart or a Ross type store.

I wear 36C and bought this in medium. Perfect fit - follow care instructions before wear. Only wish here was the opening for the main bra itself was in front, instead of the back, to make clean up easier.

It's smart, functional, and somehow manages to be stylish and sophisticated (yes, a nursing/pumping bra!) too. I feel more like myself and less like a dairy cow when wearing it, and for a new mama that is HUGE. Seriously, I wish my regular bras were this pretty! I was 32C pre-pregnancy, wearing 34D now, and the M fits well with plenty of options to customize the sizing of the band and cups built into the bra's clever design.
This is a game changer.  Absolutely love this bra.  it is very comfortable and does the job.
Product runs slightly small. This is my second purchase of this bra because i have oversupply and need a bra that can loosen as I engorge. I also use it for pumping

I really wanted to love this bra as it sounded like everything I needed in a nursing/pumping bra as I returned to work. The hands free pumping aspect works very well I think and lives up to its word. However, as the day goes on I find this bra to become increasingly uncomfortable. The clips under the bust start to dig into my skin. Plus, the clips are difficult to reattach one handed after nursing. Also, the support isn't great and I am moving all day long at my job and don't feel like it's enough. It seems as though the elasticity seems to give way halfway through the day.

It is a cute bra which is very rare in the nursing/pumping bra world it turns out. However, for the price I can't say that I think it's worth it and there is no way I would purchase an additional one.

This bra is great! I can comfortably pump hands free while wearing it and it's very cute! Most of my nursing bras are not very attractive, so it's nice to find a nursing bra that looks good on me. I can also comfortably nurse in this bra. I would definitely recommend this bra for pumping/nursing moms!
summary: This bra is great! I can comfortably pump hands free while wearing ...

reviewText: I just got the Arden and the Ayla bras and they are AMAZING! very supportive and comfortable.  Easy to use and the best part is you don't have to strip down and change bras every time you want to pump.  Plus they look really cute,  which is not something I can say about most nursing bras! Highly recommended!  My only regret is that I didn't have these bras with my first two kids!

I love that on top of being a truly hands-free pumping bra, this bra provides great support of my D breasts. It's not going to give you a push-up effects, and almost squashes your chest a little. BUT what I need at work is a quick way to pump in between meetings, and feel like my chest is supported. This bra gives me both of those.

reviewText: was as exspected

These are yet another stunning pair of KS earrings. I was a little perplexed with the online image and wondered how true it was to the actual earrings. It turns out the online image is pretty accurate and not exaggerated at all. The brown mother of pearl reflects different colors depending on the light; brown, peach, rose, green, clear and even a tad bit of grey. In addition, each color that it reflects also comes in various hues. The brown for example, is not uniform...The brown is lighter in some parts and darker in others. Its a truly spectacular mlange of reflections that coordinate beautifully with each other. The rose gold plating is a perfect match for this pair that predominantly lets out brown and peachy hues.  These earrings are versatile in that they willl go with any color you want to wear. They also look dressy enough for a classy event yet can also be worn in a casual setting. While KS' famous signature Danielle earrings come to 2.5 inches, the Alex earrings come a little shorter to around 1.75 inches (including the top-most part of the hook). They are overall very sturdy and well-crafted. Unlike the Danielle earrings that are a bit heavy, the Alex earrings are rather light and far more comfortable and feasible for ladies with sensitive ears. If you like brown mother of pearl and classy earrings and you're looking for something lighter than the Danielle earrings, you will love these. Lastly, the packaging was a sight to behold. They were beautifully wrapped in the popular KS sky blue pouch and then also bubble-wrapped for extra protection. I was excited like a little child to unwrap each pair of exquisitely packaged KS earrings. 5 stars.
summary: Yet another gorgeous pair from KS

But they're surprisingly tight in the thigh area...I wear a size large in the maternity clothes (was a size medium pre-pregnancy, but I've found all the medium stuff is just too tight for me now) - my thighs currently measure 23" around (they were 22"...but so it goes).  I got the size large in these & they are just too tight...they fit - but they are SUPER thin; that mixed with the tightness...just makes me very uncomfortable (& makes me feel like my neighbors kittens could destroy these in a matter of seconds).  I have a few other pairs of capris & pants from this brand - all size large & they fit wonderfully, which is why I find it kinda odd that these were so tight...but thankfully amazon makes it easy to return.

This is a pretty cool set of pants. I wear a 38" regularly, and followed the size chart when buying this. The XXL's fit nicely and are comfortable around the waist. This is an inexpensive hardshell backpack for the Phantom 3 line. I've been lugging my Phantom around in the original box it came in. While the box is totally serviceable, it's a pain to use and (of course) not very durable. The problem was that I didn't want to spend $200 or more on a hardshell case.

My needs were this:

1) I wanted a hardshell case mostly for personal transportation. That is, I wasn't planning on entrusting this case to baggage handling machines or other people. I wanted a case I felt comfortable putting in my car, taking to the park or on long road trips, etc. If you want a "bombproof" case, you need to think about the $200 Pelican style cases.

2) I wanted precut foam that was tightly fitted.

3) I wanted travel/carry options.

The Cheerwing checks all those boxes.

SHELL:

The outer plastic shell is certainly not bombproof like a Pelican case. It's thin, cheap plastic. But I don't need something that can bounce off the top off an expedition vehicle, down a rocky crag, and into a hippo-infested river. I'm a suburban dad, not a Nat Geo explorer. This case is sufficient to withstand light drops, luggage shifting onto it, kids kicking, rain, and all the normal daily hazards that most of us face.

The case is significantly better than cardboard and sturdier than a softshell case. It provides good everyday protection for your drone. As one other reviewer noted, the shell comes with a plastic film. Mine came torn up a little and it made the case look like it had been damaged in shipping. No biggie to me because I knew the case was going to get scratched up pretty quickly like all my other hardshell cases have (after all, that'd kind of the point of having a hardshell case: they take abuse). Remove the film and you get a glossy faux carbon-fiber look

The zipper pull feels sturdy, and I haven't had any hitches with them.

FOAM:

The interior foam is low quality, but as it's primary job is crush-resistance I think it's fine. A softer foam would have offered more impact-absorption, but you have to keep in mind that a foam insert for a Pelican case of this size would cost almost as much as the entire Cheerwing backpack. So, keep in mind that this backpack is better suited towards crush-resistance. If you plan to throw your drone case around a lot 1) you are madman, and 2) you should buy a more expensive case with impact-absorbing foam.

I found the foam cutouts to be perfectly acceptable. Everything slotted in just fine and the case closed up easily.

The one thing I didn't like is that the top foam piece in my case is loose, so it occasionally comes out. This isn't a big deal, but it surprised me a little. If I end up finding it really annoying, I'm pretty sure I can just glue or velcro tape that piece in.

TRAVEL:

The top handle seems to be stitched in well and makes it easy to pick up and move the case. When I pack my drone away for a bit, the top handle make it easy to hang the drone from a hook or to carabineer it onto a closet rod. The back straps leave a little to be desired as they are very basic straps.

This is a "prop-off" case. You need to remove props or prop-guard before you put your drone in it. The upside of that is the case has smaller dimensions than prop-on cases. In fact, when you combine the thinner plastic, cheaper foam, and smaller dimensions, the case is surprisingly light. The light and compact design are great for everyday use taking your drone to the park or packing into the minivan with all your vacation luggage.

Overall, I really like this backpack. I would have liked slightly better backpack straps, but this otherwise is a great value. I honestly think will provide ample protection for the vast majority of situations most of us face when we travel with our drones. That being said, if you're going on an expedition (or your thinking about entrusting your expensive drone to an airline luggage system), you might want to upgrade to a more expensive and rugged case.
summary: If you don't need a bombproof case, this is the one for you!

reviewText:
AWStech 42mm Stainless Steel Band with Butterfly Buckle Clasp  - Black

This black stainless steel band for the Apple Watch is beautifully elegant. It up scales my Sport Watch very nicely. I needed to remove four links for a correct fit and the included tool made doing so, a snap. You just insert the pointed end in one of the holes at the side of a link. There are spring posts in each removable link. Gently press a little bit and you'll be able to release and remove a link. Then to join the links again, align one end then use the tool to press down the other pin and slide the links together until they click shut. This is about as easy as a removable link band gets to adjust. The butterfly latch is very easy to use, to remove and attach the watch.

It looks fantastic with my Space Gray Watch. The surface has a semi-matte shine with very little glare. It also seems to take on body temperature and not be cold to the touch. When you run your fingers over the surface it has a unique texture, it's not smooth as much as it feels like paper. Very unusual and very interesting. I love the difference from typical bands I'm used to. I'm very impressed and think you will be too. It's a stunner and also comes beautifully packaged for gifting.

This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.
summary: A stunner, a beautiful upgrade for any Apple Watch

reviewText:
Got this for my girlfriend. She is a 36DDD and the X-Large fit well considering her bust is about 10 inches more than the size chart suggests a X-Large fit will be. As for the shirt itself (the white part and not the sequenced design) it is a very soft material that is noticeably see thru, the bottom of the shirt isn't uniformly circular but instead rises up at the hips. The design's on the shirt are sequenced on. This sequenced on material can be felt whilst wearing it, its a bit itchy. None of the sequences appeared to fall off but upon removing the shirt a few sequences were left on the skin having come off were the wrist is poking through the stitching and onto her. If another long sleeve shirt is worn under this, the high hip design, the see thru material, and the sequences poking through the shirt and into the skin is not an issue whatsoever and it becomes a great soft blouse but by itself its almost too uncomfortable to wear. If there were not any sequences she would want another one of these in a dark colour because of the fabric and the cut but this particular one in white is not ideal for her.

Purchased at a discount in exchange for review
summary: White is see thru, sequences poke through the shirt, uncomfortabe design but very soft shirt

reviewText: I received this product with a discount in exchange of my honest review. This product had a fast delivery and good packaging. It is not too thick or thin and the material is of a good and resistant quality.  The main part is done from 90 % Polyester. The coat is not very heavy. I would say it has the weight of the same classical coats that are similar to this one. It has a tie and actually I would say that s very trendy. The idea is that the coat should look oversized and this is the main goal of having to tie. The model is interesting and trendy but i would say that the coat is still too large. I am size 10-12 and I got a medium one to be certain and still the coat in my opinion looks way to big. This precept has a lot of great features but you should keep in mind the sizes and the model before ordering.

reviewText:
I really like this Industrial. I'm usually not one to change out that particular piercing and have stuck to the original one I have but I'm so happy I decided to give this a try. Buying industrial piercings can be tricky. I've had this piercing for nearly ten years and in time have forgotten my gauge so it was a bit of a tossup as to whether it'd fit and luckily for me, it did. Also don't forget about then length of your piercing. It's not easy to measure but it's doable otherwise it might not be long enough. Also it is not suggested to change them out until it is healed. I know the temptation for switching piercings but it's really not worth it.

The jewelry itself is great. Each ball unscrews so you can insert it which isn't my favorite as it can be a bit tricky and takes longer than my other but in time I'm sure I'll get used to it. Honestly I wanted to give it five stars and debated it but the only reason I didn't was because one of the balls won't show the diamond if you screw it as tight as you can. It was a bit misleading in the picture in that sense as you obviously assume both with show. I'm keeping it anyways and will just make sure the one that won't show is on my hairline since that one is difficult to see anyways so it's not a big deal for me. I tried to not screw it tight but it's just too loose to make me comfortable that I won't lose the ball. I've had that happen and it can be a pain to replace and in this case, since it's a more specialized one, I'd have to order it a second time so leaving it partially unscrewed isn't an option. The only other problem I can see someone running into is the actually diamond logo touches the helix, the outside/top portion, of my ear. I don't plan on wearing this consistently but if I did then I imagine the rubbing might irritate it. I've added a few photos to show those two issues for reference and one also of the ball loose that will show both diamonds but all the others show it tight which is why the diamond isn't visible on one end.

The negatives aren't a big deal for me but for some might be an issue. Otherwise, I love this jewelry. It's cute and matches a set of earrings I bought perfectly. I would recommend this for any Harley Quinn fan!

This doesn't matter much since both labels are not well known.  The other mislabel was inside where it says the shirt is 100% cotton.  The description on amazon says its about 70% cotton and 30% lyocell (which i prefer).  The lyocell mix will reduce the shrinkage and reduce wrinkling.  The actual shirt fabric has some north south stretch so i am inclined to think that the label on the actual shirt is wrong.  I am very happy with the shirt otherwise and love the comfortable fit. PROS- Soft. Warm. Slouchy.

CONS- Seam. Slouchy. Overpriced for the quality.

I wish I would have purchased a small. If you wear juniors sizes, order the size you normally wear in juniors. If you wear misses sizes, you may want to go up a size. If you wear men's sizes, you will want to go up two sizes.

As for the quality of this shirt, I ordered the one with Barbie against the rainbow cloud background. The image quality was perfect! It was not pixelated, faded, or blurry. The one thing that did disappoint me is the quality of the material. It feels like neoprene and has a foul plastic oder. The odor was very strong and I had to air out the shirt outside because I didn't want to wash and dry it with other clothes (the odor was that bad!) The case feels slightly slick, but that may be just my comparison to my old case. The card holder works very well. It does hold one card. The card feels like it's not going to come out accidentally but there's also an indent so you can remove the card without fighting with it. Very happy I picked this one. The shipping does take a while coming from China - pay attention to the delivery estimate.

Although it was a bit pricey, this designer scarf is "a keeper."  It arrived exactly as described, and is extremely attractive with the two-sided, repeated black and red Michael Kors logo.  An added plus is that it is acrylic, and it can be hand washed--rather than dry cleaned--if cleaning is needed.  The only thing that I would have changed is that the laundering instructions, in at least 10 different languages, were attached to the (small) Michael Kors label.  Frankly, I remedied that with a few snips of the stitching on the label.  That left the prestigious label, but omitted the "United Nations" laundering instructions.

reviewText:
Women Sun Cap Outdoor Hiking Fishing Wide Brim Hat

This is a versatile nylon hat which fits a range of 56-59cm head circumference by using the cord on the back of the hat to adjust.  I have a small head, so I tighten it as far as it would go, and it fits perfect.  It gives 360 degrees comprehensive protection,resist UV damage, has a removeable side curtain allows ventilation and is comfortable,and fast drying. It comes with a face mask which you attach with velcro, however it attaches pretty high up towards the bridge of your nose.  So, if you want full face protection, this is great for you, but if you want it down lower on your nose, towards the tip, you will have to attach it with safety pins. There is also another piece  which protects your neck from the sun and bugs  which you attach/detach with hooks which make it easy to put on/take off.
Overall, I am very happy with this product and think it is a good value for under $16.  I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review, however, the discounted price did not influence my product review. My reviews are based on my own personal opinion of the product and the experience I had in using the product.  This review is my own opinion and I am in no way influenced by the seller or the fact that I received the product at a discount.  I have had ample time to evaluate and test the product.  Based on my evaluation of the product and the price, I would and have recommend this product to family and friends.  As always, if anything changes my opinion of the product, I will update my review to reflect those updates. Please let me know if you have any questions.  Hopefully my review has helped you, as I know I always read reviews before purchasing anything anymore.  In my opinion, customer reviews are the most honest and helpful.

What I liked about this hat:

1. The light colour. Specially under the sun light colours are recommended.
2. The 2 different covers. The one for the face and the one for the neck.
3. The cord for adjust it in a windy weather.
4. The way the covers could be removed. You can wear the hat with or without the covers.
5. The way the hat's lateral borders could be folded.
6. The "holes" the hat has at the top allowing the air flows through it.

I had not dislikes about it. I strongly recommend this hat!! I would buy it again.

I hope you found my review helpful. Click on the YES button if so. Thanks for stopping by!

Product provided on a discount price for the purpose of evaluation and review.
summary: You should try it for your gardening projects.

reviewText:
I like the More Than Trade Womens Wide Brim Hat.

- It fit as expected and I believe it would fit most head sizes.  If it is too loose there is an elastic cord with a plastic stopper at the back of the hat on the outside to tighten the hat.  If you have a larger head I think it may be a bit tight since there is no way of extending the size.
- I really like the lightweight breathable material that was used on this product.
- I like  the versatility of the hat.  You can wear it as just a regular hat, you can pull up the sides and secure them with the snaps or you can add on the other pieces to help protect your neck from the sun and other elements or add on the face guard to help protect from dust, sand and dirt.  I like the use of the hooks which make it easy to attach and remove the back piece.  If you want to add the face guard on while you have the hat on it is a little challenging since it attaches using Velcro which is placed on the inside brim of the hat.
- I like that the under chin strap.  Do note that it is not removable.  I like that the strap has a plastic stopper to help secure the strap under your chin with a separate bead used as a stopper to ensure that it doesnt come off.

I like the More Than Trade Womens Wide Brim Hat.  It is a good hat for working in the garden, going to the beach, etc. since it provides good sun protection.

I received this product at a discount for my honest review.

My wife has been trying this hat out as she has a cleaning business and she's outdoors at times cleaning windows.  She said it fits very well and she really likes the added neck protection. She's somewhat worried about the little plastic hooks that attach the neck protection to the hat but will see how they hold up over time. If one does break it would be pretty simple to use a safety pin or some thread to attach the two together.
The face shield is not as well designed, the Velcro tabs to attach it are a little too far back and it keeps that piece too high on her face, right at the bottom of her eyelids making it uncomfortable to wear, she said that if the Velcro pieces were double their length or if the face piece ends were just a little longer it would be perfect as it needs some more room for adjustment, "reason for dropping one star".

Otherwise she really likes the hat, ventilation around the top is excellent and it's not too heavy. The brim is nice and wide and really shades the face.
summary: Nice hat, just one small problem.

I purchased this top in the grey color and a size medium. I'm 5'10" and around 135, and typically wear a larger small to a smaller medium. The medium fit me very well in the shoulders. With that, if you are between sizes or JUST fit a size, or have broad shoulders, I'd suggest sizing up. The rest of the top is drapey and loose, and doesn't matter nearly as much.

I couldn't find a material label, but it feels a lot like a super light sweatshirt material (outer portion) to a heavier tee shirt. The material has a teeny bit of stretch, but not a whole lot. The sleeves are a bit longer than 3/4, and come to about my mid-forearm. The bottom flap of the cardigan is hemmed along the edge with no fringe, and is sewn to the top near the inside of the opposite shoulder. The fringed side is a raw edge with the fringe knotted, which crisscrosses to the opposite shoulder and stays in place with a button. You wouldn't be able to really wear this as an open cardigan, as the one side is sewn in place. The bottom portion and sleeve "cuffs" are hemmed, and the top is raw.

I've seen a very similar top advertised on a popular styling service and I've also seen this style popping up in my friend's social media feed for a lot more than here, so I am really glad I found it here for considerably less. I love the look and it's just a super comfortable top. I paired it with a solid tank and jeans with boots (my fall go to), and got some great compliments at work! Another favorite for me! I did receive this top at a small discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased review. All opinions are 100% my own.

reviewText:
Comfortable and lightweight.  Good hat to wear when it's sunny outside.  I'm an avid gardener and I've been wearing this hat for sun protection. The circumference of my head is 23 inches and this hat fits me nicely.  It has an adjustable strap to keep it from falling or blowing off.  It's a nice military gray design.  It has a couple of vent holes on the sides so it allows heat to escape.

I took a star off because the snap on one side broke and came off the first time I tried the hat on.  I prefer to wear this type of hat with the sides held up because I like to feel the air on my face but I don't have that option with the hat I received.  I included two pictures below. The second picture shows the side where the snap closure broke off.  Aside from the durability issue, It's still a nice hat to wear while working around the house.

reviewText:
I keep a pretty active outdoorsy lifestyle whether it is camping, fishing, boating, biking, etc. People that spend a lot of time outdoors, especially in Florida need to do everything possible to shade themselves from the harmful effects of long-term exposure to the sun. When I ran across this product, More Than Trade Men's Sun Protection Cap Outdoor Hiking Camping Fishing Wide Brim Hat I knew I had to give it a try. So I bought it. Read on for more information.

The product comes in a small disposable plastic bag. The packaging is rather sparse. There was no documentation or written material included with the hat. I suppose that is ok, as its just hat. However, thats not the whole truth as it is a little more complex than your average hat. There are two separate pieces of fabric. The first shades the back of your head/neck and attaches to the hat with clips. The other shades the front of your face and attaches to the hat via two pieces of Velcro. The hat, along with these two pieces of fabric do a very good job of shading your face/neck from the sun. In the photographed picture, the hat almost looks cheesy. It looks like something the samurai would wear when they go fishing. I presumed that the hat would be a lower quality, due to the funny look of the hat (as pictured). That is not the case, the material feels nice, exactly like the material that was used in one of my other top of the line outdoor hats. In person, the quality is apparent.

In summary, this item is a great buy for the money. For people that spend a lot of time outdoors, in the sun, its worth the price several times over. Frankly, I think this hat is better than the hats that some of the big name companies offer. What a value!
summary: Look like a Samurai and shield yourself from the sun!

reviewText: Great quality hat. I recommend it.

I wanted something to use when I go fishing or walks with the dogs or just out in the sun in general. I am bald and therefore the sun will burn my scalp into beef jerky if not protected. This aides in allowing the activities I enjoy with out the crippling burn and heat from the sun. This is breathable material and feels great. I received the Hat a discount but would have paid retail godly based on the amazing quality and feel of this hat!!
summary: Great for outdoors and all occasions!

Nice - Men's Sun Protection Cap Lets first have some additional data on Sun Protection; UV radiation and skin cancer Exposure to ultraviolet (UV) radiation is the leading cause of skin cancer. There are two types of UV radiation: Ultraviolet A (UVA). UVA radiation is able to pass through glass and may cause premature aging and wrinkling of the skin. Research suggests that UVA may also play a role in causing basal cell carcinoma, squamous cell carcinoma, and melanoma. Ultraviolet B (UVB). UVB radiation is more closely linked with the development of skin cancer and melanoma. UVB radiation causes sunburn and does not penetrate through car windows or other types of glass. It is important to protect your skin from both UVA and UVB radiation. Other sun protection tips Limit sun exposure between 10:00 AM and 4:00 PM, when the sun's rays are the most intense. Practice the shadow rule: if your shadow is shorter than you, you should find shade. Pay attention to the UV index, which is often included in the weather report. This index is a relative measure of how damaging exposure to the sun will be on any particular day. The index is a scale of 1 to 10+. When the index is 10 or higher, people should stay indoors, if possible. Be careful around water, snow, or sand. These surfaces reflect the damaging rays of the sun, increasing your risk of getting sunburned. Wear a long-sleeved shirt, long pants, and a hat that shades the face, neck, and ears. Dark clothing with tightly woven fabric blocks more sun than white or loosely woven fabrics. For additional protection, look for clothing made with special sun-protective materials. Wear sunglasses with 99% to 100% UV absorption. They will provide optimal protection for the eyes and the surrounding skin. Be even more cautious if you are taking medications that may make you more sensitive to the sun. These include specific types of antibiotics, anti-inflammatories, antifungals, blood pressure medications, and chemotherapies. Keep babies younger than 6 months old completely covered and in the shade. NOW ABOUT THIS PRODUCT; 360 degrees sun protection, very lightweight and fast drying material, excellent to go on Hiking short/long trips, believe me the sun gets brutal sometimes and this protection cap will do its job in protecting you from direct exposure, therefore helping you be more at ease when hiking in sunny days we just went to claim the Picacho del Diable peak in Baja (tallest mountain in Baja Mexico +10,000 ft) a 5 days trip, the last one in particular in the Laguna Salada (desert), and this Cap sure help a lot during that 112degrees dayit really dries fast and the 360 degree protection made a difference.the front breathable mesh lest you breath easily in those dusty trails.for that and many more thingsI recommend this productso enjoy This is my first impression of, and limited experience with, the product. All opinions are my own. I do not automatically give 5 stars to every product. I also do not give just 1 star to products I dislike if it would still be good for someone else. This is valuable feedback for both the product manufacturer as well as the Amazon community, I hope my review will share some light into what's the product is all about and more important how useful it is along with its quality. reviewText: My husband was so excited when I got this in the mail. I was going to use it but I decided to let him take it on his canoe trip as his old one was looking worse for wear. He really liked it. The brim is really wide and it clips up on either side if you need it too. It is thin enough to not be too hot but the brim is wide enough to keep his neck shaded! Perfect! I received this at a discount in exchange for my honest review. I only give 5 stars after testing the item and liking it!

This hat is camo type design.  The hat itself is deep enough to stay on your head easily.  It is also adjustable which is really nice if you have a very small head.  It also has a chin strap that you can use.  The brim is about 4 inches wide all the way around.  It does also have some nice additional features.  It has two snaps on the side if you want to snap the sides up in the "up" position for a different look.  It also has four vents in the bucket part of the hat to let it breath.  All the seams are nicely finished - even in the underside of the bucket part of the hat.  The brim is stitched with 10 rows of stitching also.  Even the headband part has 6 rows of stitching.  I received this item at a discount or for free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.  Overall, I feel this hat is well made, fits properly, has some really nice features too.  I would highly recommend this hat at this point.  Should I run into any problems in the future with this hat I will definitely update my review but at this point I don't anticipate any problem.s

reviewText:
This poncho is really cute, but it's just okay in my opinion. Based on the pictures I thought the material was going to be softer and more knit, but in person it is harder and more stiff. It isn't bad though, and is thick and of nice quality. The fringe is super cute and knotted tightly so I'm not worried about those coming undone or anything.
I am 5'4, 125 pounds and a 34D bust for reference and I purchased this in a medium. It fits, however it is a bit tight on my shoulders. This makes it slightly uncomfortable and a little difficult to get on and off. If you normally order a medium, It might be beneficial to order up a size. However, because it fits everywhere else and is the perfect length for my height Im not sure ordering up a size would have helped me. I also noticed there is a slight tear on the inside of my poncho, and I saw this before trying it on. If that tear rips more, The one side of the poncho will completely come off. However, it is an easy fix so I'm not really concerned about it.
Overall, I gave this 4 instead of 3 stars because it is really cute and I will wear it in the future. I just had higher hopes for it based on the price and pictures. Also, it shipped really fast, my expected delivery date was November 27th and it is November 9th.
I received at a discounted rate for my honest and unbiased opinion.

Long ship time. It's a canvas belt, period.

Will this belt last you 3 yrs? I don't think so. Will it last 2 yrs, I'm not even sure about that. The main reason I see a longevity issue is that when you open the belt release to take it off, the teeth get caught in the fibers of the belt material. I've worn it one day and there are 3 snags that have been pulled up from the teeth not giving a "clean release". Along with that comes the fact that I can't get it off in one motion, I have to open it up, pull it tighter (to clear any of the belt fabric from the teeth) and then pull the belt off... So far, it has been a hassle. I blame the teeth, if it had a flat bar across to grip instead it probably wouldn't snag on the belt fabric. I like these kinds of belts for clean look you get so I'll try a different one. This one is really inexpensive but I don't think it is worth the little money it costs regardless.
summary: Really inexpensive but I'd still pass

reviewText: Order at least 3 sizes up!

I ordered this after searching long and hard through many wedding dress toppers. It just looked so beautiful and elegant. Unfortunately, the sizing charts they offer on the page for this are not for tops, but I used my best judgment. I got this item quickly and knew it was a 50/50 whether it would fit or not according to the other reviews. When I opened the packaging, I was really excited. The item itself is really beautiful. There's a ton of detail and it looks great in person. Unfortunately, the top did not fit correctly. In my case, the chest and waist fit perfectly but it was too tight around the arms and shoulders. I am disappointed that it didn't fit and am returning it tomorrow. I did contact the seller and requested an accurate sizing chart for their tops. I'm seriously considering ordering another in the next size up because I really think for the price, it's a gorgeous cover-up. I will admit there are a few stray threads that were left poking out of the jacket but nothing that couldn't be trimmed easily. The material was also a bit more scratchy than I expected it to be. Although, seeing as it's made of tulle, sequins, and beads, I suppose it makes sense. It's definitely wearable for one day. I would recommend this item for a very pretty and inexpensive way to add a little more coverage to your wedding dress, but I'd strongly suggest contacting the seller to get an accurate sizing chart so you don't waste money returning the wrong size!

reviewText:
So I guess I should have been leery when I noticed that the image was Photoshopped onto the hoodie (you can see the hoodie strings going behind the image) but I took a chance and bought it anyway. The first thing I noticed when I got the package was how very small the package was. Very thin. Upon opening the item I saw that it was technically a hoodie, just basically a long sleeved t-shirt with a hood on it. Still technically counts, but not the sort of hoodie I've grown accustomed to.

The biggest issue is the decal. It does have the piston on it with the phrase. But it is faded, wrinkled and cheap looking. The letters and piston are not individually ironed on, it is one single decal and the space in between the letters is very noticeable. It looks like something you'd make at home for a third of the price. They also list this as 80% cotton, 20%# polyester. Pretty sure this is BS. There's no tag inside the hoodie, however. So no way to tell where it came from or what the blend is. Pretty sure it's not majority cotton though.

I am returning this shirt. Unfortunately, there were too many things that I did not like about it. I am a US size 6, normally a small or medium in shirts. I am 5'4 and 128 pounds. I consider myself an "hourglass shape." I followed the sizing guide and ordered a large in this shirt.

First, I will comment on the good. The color is as shown. This is an orangy-peachy color. The side lace detail is pretty and very on trend right now. The product seemed to be of good quality. There were no loose strings falling off this shirt.

The bad: Despite following the sizing guide, I still felt this shirt was a bit too tight. The material is very clingy, meaning that all of your flaws are on full display. The material is also very thin, and somewhat see through. You pretty much HAVE to wear something underneath this shirt, which is bothersome because of how this runs small. I also felt that the shirt was a little bit short on me, which I was not expecting.

Overall, this is a cute shirt and the price is decent, but the material was too clingy and see-through for my liking. I am sure this shirt would look gorgeous on someone thinner than me!
summary: Cute shirt and gorgeous lace detailing, but too tight and clingy

This watch arrived as advertised and more.  It arrived in a beautiful box (which you don't wear anyway) and came with instructions on the adjustment of the date and time.  The R*lex I received from my employer after 25 years of service pails in comparison with this Gevril.  The R*lex given me had no instructions.  It was hit and miss on setting time and date.  I don't like a lot of gold; so this watch with gold markers fits the bill and is equally attractive.

Actually, it's large enough to be used as a tote. I carry it just about every day so it's really durable and has been holding up very well.  It has to inside zip pockets and two other pockets that could be used for your cell phone or something else.  I would definitely recommend this product.

reviewText:
Finding the perfect suitcase for carry-on purposes has been extremely difficult - they're either really ugly, hard to clean, or too big.  Then I read the reviews regarding this product, and was intrigued by the locking mechanism.  There is no zipper, and it essentially hooks into a latch for locking purposes.  It was easy to set up the lock code once I realized where I needed to find the set-up buttons (which is on the INSIDE ....).

Also, very easy to clean because of the shell!  I spilled coffee all over myself and it of course landed on the suitcase, which came off with some water on a paper towel.  I have yet to have any issues with the wheels across bumpy terrain and the suitcase itself is very light.

The inside is also a very cute design that is easy to wipe off and clean, in case your lotion spills inside.
summary: Finding the perfect suitcase for carry-on purposes has been extremely difficult - ...

reviewText: Perfect fit. Were Christmas morning PJ's...

I wanted to like these pants, they scream Christmas, and I love Christmas, not as much as Halloween though. I like the color scheme and they look warm and cozy, like a log cabin. The problem is that for the price, they are poorly made and tear easily. I had returned my first pair of pants because they arrived with a tear in them. The tear was located on the front thigh area.

I returned those and ordered a second pair. I was pretty excited, since its starting to get a little chilly, a rarity in Miami, and I immediately put my pants on as soon as they arrived. As I was walking around in my house, the pocket snagged on a closet handle and lightly tugged on the pocket. The pants ripped instantly from the pocket all the way the way to my behind. Seriously, it was instantaneous, no resistance at all, and it really was the smallest tug. I showed them to my wife, and after a few laughs, she looked over the pants and told me that the stitching was poorly done.

So here I sit, writing a two star review and I'm pretty upset. I have purchased flannel pants like these from other stores and they have lasted me forever. I would wear them out and they could withstand some light wear and tear, these however are very fragile. Be sure to use them only for some pictures and then immediately take them off and place them back in storage.

One of the other reviewers mentioned that they feel cheap, while they don't feel cheap, you can tell that somethings off when you wear them. It's like between cheap and okay. I also agree with the other reviewer that stated that the pants were very light. I don't think they would do a good job at keeping someone warm in the cold.

Pictures attached, please don't laugh at my white Casper like legs. I'm a vampire and hate the sun
summary: Great looking pants, but poor material

Awesome set of tie clip

I looked around and can only find sets with buttons and cuff links, not just tie clips. But with this set all I received was a nice selection of different sized tie clips. They work perfectly with both my large and even my slim ties. The material there made of look really good and sturdy. The springs are nice and tight. Clipping firmly to both my tie and shirt, holding the tie in place with no problems. Something else I liked is the different colors and patterns they will work great with any suit.

All in all it is an all around perfect set of tie clips. Very well made at a great price. Thank you for producing a top notch product. And I'll be looking for more of your products in the future.

I received this product at a reduced or for free for my honest unbiased full review.

These are excellent for skinny ties which have become so much more common and stylish. Before I had these I was either not using a tie pin or wearing a full size pin which honestly made me look ridiculous. Now with these pins I can now confidently start wearing more of my skinny ties. The large tie pins come in a large variety of designs and colors which will serve a variety of outfits. All these pins seem to be made with good strong materials. The spring does not make it link or turn. You can feel confident that they will work and stay in place.

reviewText:
This is exactly what I've been looking for! I cook, grill, and smoke a lot. I have used a wireless smoker/bbq thermometer for some time now, but I always find myself having to run back and forth to the kitchen to check on the meat that I put in the oven to finish it. This solves that!

Upon unboxing I installed four AAA batteries (two in the transmitter, two in the receiver) and it immediately connected wireless. No programming it, no pressing buttons until the transmitter and receiver found each other - just plug and play. The temperature transmits reliably throughout my house and on my back patio, which is where I intend to use it the most. I don't know the exact range, but it is obviously longer than I need - I suppose I can now check the temperature on my pork butt or roast from my neighbors house if I'd like to.

You can select the type of meat and it automatically selects an appropriate temperature to alert on. From there you can set the level of doneness. In the case of beef the preset values are a bit higher than I like (136F Rare, 145F Medium Rare, 162F Medium, 171F Well Done), but that's of no consequence - press the "Set" button and pick any temperature you'd like!

The receiver has a built in kick stand and belt clip, so whether you want to set it up next to you while you relax on the patio or by the pool or clip it to your belt while you are on the move, you've got options that will work for you.

I'm very pleased and expect to get a great deal of use out of this wireless thermometer. If you haven't used one before, you are missing out on a level of convenience that wasn't possible 10 or 15 years ago (at least not at an affordable price point like this).

This product was provided at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review. Even so, I do my best to be fair and honest in my reviews. As you can see from my profile, not every item gets five stars, and I bring up shortcomings in items as I find them. I do try to exercise some care in selecting items to buy, even when they are provided at a discount, based on other reviews and existing product knowledge - if I suspect that an item won't be good, I don't buy it in the first place.
summary: Exactly what I wanted to provide wireless flexibility while cooking!

First, this shirt took forever to arrive, but I guess that's what happens when you order from China. Second, it's just "ok." I am 5'4" and 124 lbs. I am small on top, around the shoulders and bust. I bought a medium because some people say they run big. The part around the shoulders and bust is fine, but the part around the mid-section is too big and baggy. The band around the bottom is awkward and puffy and too big. But if I'd gone smaller for the bottom part, the shoulder, bust and arms areas would probably be too small. I don't feel it's proportioned well. It seemed like too much trouble to return it after that long wait, and I don't dislike it completely, so I'll go ahead and wear it.

I just loved this wrap when I saw the picture.  I tend to dress in darker colors and the grays bled in perfectly with my wardrobe.  I am always reluctant to order clothing online.  I am a plus size woman and I find that I need to try almost everything on to make sure it fits in all the right places.  This wrap was one size fits all so I thought I would give it a try.

When it came I couldn't believe how well it was packaged.  It was in a mailing envelope, inside a nice zipper top plastic bag, inside a second zipper  top plastic bag with vents and it had a reusable bag with it that I assume would be the stores bag.  That bag is bright white with lovely printing on the front.  My grandson immediately latched onto that bag and started putting his story books into it to carry around.  Even though I loved it I think I have lost that shopping bag.  There was also a nice little ornament included with the wrap.  I thought that was a lovely, kind gesture.

The wrap itself is beautiful.  It is very soft.  So soft that I just wanted to snuggle down into it when I put it on.  I love the fact that there are no actual sleeves.  There are slits that you put your arms through.  I suffer from sever heat intolerance due to a chronic illness so the no sleeve aspect is very appealing to me.  My body often times is cool but my extremities and face are very warm.  This will be the perfect fall wrap for me with my condition.

Being a plus size woman the wrap is a little smaller than I would have liked it to be.  It does fit me and I can wear it but I would have liked a little more fabric.  It will fit most women perfectly as a one size fits all.  If you are a very small woman it might seem that you have excess fabric but that just means you can really snuggle up within its extra soft cashmere fabric.

I did not receive any care instructions with my cashmere wrap and since I am not familiar with cashmere I will definitely be researching how to properly launder this beautiful wrap.  I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest review.

Love this skirt and boyfriend loves it too!

This skirt is pretty much just as advertised, it looks exactly the way it does in the listing image. Its Very short so its not meant to be worn outside, its for cosplay or as a lingerie piece. I picked the red version, the colors are nice and bright.
What I didn't do before ordering is read the listing, turns out I should have. Its "free size" which usually means XS-M, in this case, its more M-XL. Its a wrap skirt with no closure (no zipper or button), it has a long strip of velcro instead. This could be an advantage, it will accommodate several different body shapes, but it also means that if you're smaller, it may be too large for you.

For reference I am size S at 5'7", 115lb, my hips are 33" and my waist is 25.5".
The skirt is supposed to sit on your hips, not your waist, the listing says that its best for 33"-40".
The measurements are 8.8" in length and the velcro stretches from about 32" to 39" in hips (so the listing is basically correct). If your hips are between 32" and 35", there will be a strip of velcro sticking out, it looks kind of awkward actually, im gonna add pictures of me wearing it so you can see for yourself. I supposed it could be cut but then you would have to fix the edges, not sure if its worth the effort.

Personally I like skirts a bit loose so I don't mind the velcro issue, overall I think it deserves the 5 stars, as long as you know that it's best for approx M-L in hips.

reviewText:
I have mixed feelings on this so I gave it a 3 star...  The  It comes very well packaged and all the buckles covered so it won't be all scratched up.  The clips open up just like traditional suspenders.  And the buckles are Very Easy to adjust.

Now because of it's great quality is why it got a 3 star.  But when I put them on my daughter with a pair of pants that always seem to be falling down she liked them at first but wasn't a fan of them.  After about 10 mins she wanted them off.  I believe it's because where the remainder of the belt from the buckle moves freely.  And how stiff the leather is, it's not very flexible like soft worn leather would be.

So overall it's Great quality but for comfort for a child not sure these are truly what you would want to get.  I'll save them for when she get's older but right now (she's 3) she does not like them.  I received these at a discounted rate for my unbiased and honest review.

I bought these suspenders for my almost 4 yr old son and he looked adorable in them! They are very high quality (leather) suspenders. They are adjustable, which is great because he is so tall. I tried them on my baby (even though reccomended for 3-8 year old and it fit. (They looked better on my older son just because of the thickness, but if I had the baby in dress clothes that are a little big, I might put them on him for function). My son is tall, but skinny so I have to buy him bigger sizes to make sure he has the correct pant length. These will work great for his pants. Super easy to adjust and snap on. I can't believe how cute these are... I might order one for my nephew! I did recieve these at a discounted rate for my honest opinion, and they rock. My son who is kind of difficult even likes them! Great Buy!

I ordered this dress for a wedding I was in. I found the dress that fit my measurements then ordered a size up because of the reviews and it was still WAY too small. I made the mistake of ordering it too close to the wedding and it would not be worth it to order another one or return mine as it wouldn't be there until a week after the wedding at the earliest.
It was not just me either; every other bridesmaid in that wedding had issues too. One had to order 2 dresses and diet/exercise for it to fit, another ordered 3 starting at a size 8 and ended up fitting into a size 14. Everyone else had theirs altered. I personally had to tear out the inside lining (the lace was stretchy but that fabric wasn't) and replaced it with a similar color that stretched after starving myself to make it fit didn't work. While doing that I found the stitching wasn't much better than mine at absolute beginner level (had never used a sewing machine before).

Pros of the dress: cute, nice color
Cons of the dress: obnoxiously small, cheaply made, inconsistent between dresses (a couple of the dresses had totally different lace patterns/colors), stiff/cheap zipper, way more suffering than it's worth.

If you insist on ordering this (or requiring it) make sure you order at least 2 sizes up to begin with and order it way in advance so you can replace it if you need to.

P.S. My photo is from AFTER I altered it by replacing the lining

I purchased this item over two months ago and wanted to delay writing a review until I had had some time with these prayer beads.  This AmorWing Tibetan OM Bead Tiger Eye Prayer Mala Bracelet is an excellent item.

One can note in the description of other prayer beads the emphasis on beauty.  Some people may view mala beads as jewelry.  These prayer beads are certainly very attractive.  That is a nice plus.  However, the two characteristics which are significant to me are durability and functionality.  I purchased this bracelet because they are prayer beads.

I wear these beads daily, and nightly.  I have purchased much less expensive mala beads in the past, but they do not hold up to the wear very well.  Going on two months of constant use, these beads have held up very well.  I will report back after six months on that issue.

A second essential is functionality.  One can pray and keep track of his/her number of recitations by feel, and not need sight.  This is permitted by the very large bead in the center of the prayer beads.  This permits a person to pray at night, in the dark, driving or when they cannot visually follow their progress.  This is not possible with the design of some other mala beads.  The extra large bead in the center is therefore a must.

The bracelet allows a person to have the mala beads with them all the time.  This is not the case with other prayer beads such as a Anglican or Catholic rosary, or a 108 count meditation bead, which one needs to carry in, and possibly forget putting in, a pocket or purse.

As an aside, I will mention that I was questioned about the prayer bead bracelet only once, and that was when a Vietnamese lady inquired if I wore it for good luck.  I did not explain further but told her that it was not a talisman.

I wish that AmorWing would translate the writing on the main, large bead in its description.  I still have not found a translation.

The AmorWing Tibetan OM Bead Tiger Eye Prayer Mala Bracelet is an excellent prayer bracelet and worth the price from my perspective.
