Three stars seems about right.  The material is on the thin / cheap side but then again it is only around $10.  To make this five stars I would recommend a little thicker material with more elasticity to it.  This would make it easier to put on / take off, and fit better (like a glove) for people with different body shapes.  Another simple improvement (worth at least one star) is to have snaps at the crotch.

Handy tip:  To reduce strain on the material / snaps, use your finger nails to separate the snaps instead of pulling on the material.  Doing this (on all items with snaps) will eliminate the possibility of the snaps / material from failing.  :)

reviewText:
This product runs insanely small, especially in the length.  I normally would wear a x-small/small in similar style victoria secret garments, but I ordered a medium after reading through the product info. I could only get the medium on as far as my waist, but once my arms were in it I couldn't even get the garment pulled up on to my shoulders. The rib-knit fabric is only 2-way stretch, meaning it only has stretch in one direction, in this case horizontally. There is no way to stretch the fabric up over your shoulders! Don't be deceived by the fabric being cotton, it feels like the worst quality cotton ever made. Extremely stiff and rough.

The worst part, it ships from China so it's pretty much impossible to return unless you plan to more than what the garment cost on shipping costs .
summary: Buyer Beware! Horrible fit, poor fabric & costly return rates!!!!

reviewText: Good bra for the price.

This bra looks like it would fit just fine, but once I had it on the straps would NOT stay up. It was almost like the straps were set too far apart from each other and that's why they kept sliding down my arms because of this I really ended up hating the bra. Every time I would wear it I would curse those stupid straps for having to pull them back up. Who wants to constantly be adjusting their bra?? Especially at work.
As for the rest of the bra, it was great! There was a lot of support, even without an underwire and this would be the perfect bra for a working and nursing mother like I was. I felt comfortable wearing this bra with work clothes and when I got home I could keep it on for nursing my little one. Note: I was not pumping with this bra, I do think it would be a little difficult to use for pumping.
Good luck searching for a good nursing bra if you're a working mother. I had the hardest time with this and went through several bras. I truly think everyone is different and you probably just have to try out a few. This bra was horrible for me, but maybe for you and your body type it would work. Good luck momma!

reviewText: These are great and the price is fair. They're soft and comfortable. Just a bit hard to work with it with one hand while holding the baby, but that goes with any bra I suppose.

This bra is super soft and comfortable--it's easy to see why it makes a good sleeping bra. That said, it's also thick enough that it could be worn during the day (I don't think nipples would be visible underneath it). The clip detaches and reattaches SUPER easily -- yet not so much that it would happen by accident.  It really can be done with one hand.  Only downside is that it does seem to be a bit small--I ordered medium (started out pre-pregnancy as a 34/36B, am currently a 38C) but it was definitely too small.  Large fits me well now (31 weeks pregnant), but I may have to end up getting an XL after the baby is born and the milk comes in. But yeah--super comfy and convenient!

reviewText: I bought this product for my wife. She loves it and in fact bought 2 more. Great quality and support.

This bra is super comfortable and the pale pink color is lovely. The clips are sturdy and have held up well over 5 months of use. The reasons I bumped it down one star are

1. Rather than having molded cups it has removable pads- which are large enough that the outline doesn't show through - but can get easily folded up when unclipped and are a pain to fix. Especially in public.

I ordered this nursing bra because I was looking for an at-home nursing bra and because it is similar to one I ordered not too long ago but needed to return due to sizing issues.  The previous one I ordered was size large which was too small so I ordered up to a size x-large for this one and sadly it was still too small to accommodate my DDs.  It does not provide enough coverage or support either.

The quality is decent enough.  Definitely for at-home or sleeping wear.  It comes with removable molded foam cups.  It is seamless and wire free.  I would recommend looking for something with more structure and support for wear outside the home. The front snaps easily close and open with just only two fingers which as any nursing mom knows how important a feature that is in a nursing bra. The material is soft and stretchy.

It was returned as the sizing does not accommodate my needs.  I would recommend for the not so busty.

Reason for Purchase: I am 5 months pregnant and wanted a bra that I could comfortably sleep in and take with me to the hospital when I deliver.  I wanted the bra to give support while still have a pretty, modern look.

Merchandise: The bra arrived in secure packaging inside a plastic re-sealable bag.  I received the beige bra. The bra has two front snaps to allow the bra to open in order to nurse. The clips are easy to use. The bra also has removable foam inserts.

The Good: My favorite attribute about bra is the adjustable straps.  The straps allow for great coverage and comfort, as it distributes the weight over my shoulders.  I also like that I could adjust the strap length and the overall circumference of the bra, due to the back extenders. I am a 36 circumference and I ordered a Large. The bra fit as expected  if anything, I would say I fell on the too small side rather than the too large. Therefore, if you are between sizes, I recommend going up a size.

The Not-So-Good: The bra straps seem to be wide set, which if not tightened correctly, can cause the strap to fall down on my shoulder.

My Recommendation: Overall, this bra is exactly what I expected. It is comfortable and a great bra to wear throughout the night. Although finding a size can be tricky, the size I bought fit nicely and I was able to further dial in my size by using the adjustable straps and back extender. I would recommend this bra to a friend.

I purchased this nursing bra in the final weeks of my pregnancy. I was hesitant to order a nursing bra online, but after zero luck trying on maternity bras in the store I decided to give this one a shot. The bras I tried on in the store were ok, but not super comfortable. I have been having a rash like pain on my bra line that the doctor indicated was from nerves stretching to their limit. He advised trying a sports bra to help alleviate the discomfort. When this bra arrived (and super fast thanks to amazon prime), I was so excited to try it on immediately. The bottom of the bra is stretchy and fits similar to a sports bra. I was very surprised at how comfortable the bra was initially, but mostly was thrilled that it really did eliminate my discomfort at the bra line! I have worn this now a few times and have still been very pleased with how comfortable this bra is. As with many nursing bras, it has the hook to make one handed unhooking for breastfeeding much easier. Also, the fabric has just the right amount of padding and a spot for nursing pads. Overall, I am very happy with this nursing bra, especially for the price! More comfortable and less expensive than those I tried on in the store!

I received this product at a discount in exchange for my HONEST review.
summary: Very happy with this nursing bra!

reviewText:
I have a three year old and an eight month old.  I nursed my three year old for twenty-six months and still going strong with my eight month old.  I have had a hard time finding nursing bras I like.  The ones I have used had underwire in them or a hard piece on the side that always dug into me.  A comfortable bra is a necessity whether you are nursing or not.

For the price, I figured this bra was worth trying.  I ordered the L. I am normally a 38C in nursing bras.  The straps are wider than I am used to.  Most of my bras have a skinnier strap.  The usual clasp setting I would put it on at the back of the bra did not work for this one.  I had to try another one.  Once I got the straps figured out, I had no problem wearing it the rest of the day and it was quite comfortable. I am a few days in using the bra and quite happy.

It hooks and unhooks easily for nursing.  The last thing you want to do is mess with a difficult clasp when wrangling a fussy baby.  It comes with removeable pads.  The opening is at the top instead of the sides with most bras.  They were easy to remove and move around. I found the bra to be supportive and comfortable.

Only con is that the pads sometimes move or get flipped over.  It is an easy fix, but has happened a couple times.  If they annoy you, they are easy to remove.

I received this product at a discount or free for my unbiased review.  I hope that my honest opinion was helpful.

Only 1 out of 5 have been able to handle compressing 2 strands of 1/8" 550 Paracord.  So I have one working pull and 4 broken pieces.  Only one has worked and I've used 25% of my purchased (2 packs of 10 pieces each)... I am NOT amused.  Maybe the should say "On the Road*".  *unless you use Paracord.

These things are GREAT!  My first purchase of zipper-pull end closures was a design that accommodates two 1/8" cords through a hole in the hinge, then compresses them between rows of ridges.  Those pulls were too small for any of the cord that I have.  I've got about 10 varieties of 1/8 cord, which I believe to be all in standard sizes.  None of them fit the clasps I first tried.  It was possible to compress the tab far enough to get the clasp to engage but doing so damaged the clasp.

Out of desperation, I decided to try some other zipper-pull closure designs and gave these a try.  What a difference!  It's a bit challenging to get these open but that's generally a Good Thing since it means they will stay closed once assembled.  The trick to opening them is to put a bit of tension on the hinge while pushing the clasp free.  Once it comes loose you'll need to keep tension on the hinge until you get the other clasp free, then it opens right up.

Once open, slip the cord in and close the clasp on it.  I didn't think it would close due to the extremely small amount of clearance but it did and it's near impossible to pull the clasp off once locked.  On one of my tests, I managed to damage the shroud on the cord before the clasp pulled free.  That's a good hold.

In short it was a bit difficult to open but extremely easy to close securely.  My only complaint is that this is an add-on item but then as good as these are I might buy enough of them to qualify the purchase without buying anything else.

reviewText: This corset is amazing, especially for the price! Shipping was much faster than expected, by about 1-2 weeks and the quality was much higher than anticipated. I spent about 3 hours wearing this set last night and got a tooon of compliments (we went to a club), guys couldn't take their eyes off me and the girls all thought it was beautiful. My husband had to help me lace it up because the metal facets in the front are very rigid and hard to do up if the lacings are already tightened, but once someone has gone through and tightened everything it fits snug and stays that way. It was vaguely hard to breathe all night long, but it definitely kept the girls pushed up and secure. I am normally a size 8, usually a medium top because of my breast size (32K) and I ordered an XXL. The skirt fit perfectly and sat about midway down my thighs and fully tightened the corset fit just like it was supposed to. I danced, bumped and grinded all night in it and it held up very well so I wouldn't worry about the quality of it with normal wear and tear...though I wouldn't expect it to hold up well to washing. Sorry no pictures, but I highly recommend it!

What i expected

I gave the seller 1 star for this product.  I give the shirt 3 stars but that may be stretching it as well. The shirt is not officially licensed as it states in the description.  The one I received had zero tags on it and the care tag had been cut, leaving only the manufacturer label which is in Chinese.  The shirt fits great though and feels awesome; wasn't too loose or too tight.  I ordered large (5'11, 195#). The image was laughable.  It seriously looked like they ran it through an inkjet printer.  The front image was streaked with grey, light purple and blue and is difficult to tell what it is supposed to say.  The back image was white and quite legible but it looked as though they made a print setup error causing a mirror-image outline which was offset to the right. In short, the design was poorly crafted.  Not one to be thrown off by someone's misgivings, I was able to remedy the back image issue and I can live with the puke-ish front image.  However if you're one who expects what the description lays out, then avoid this.  Probably best to avoid this seller as well; I waited 33 days for this (it was Prime,ordered 9/26...it never left China until 10/19, a day after I was told that it would arrive!!)
summary: The shirt fits great though and feels awesome

This is a neat new take on the long standing traditional style belt. This belt completely eliminates the prong and belt holes. Instead, it offers a ratchet system, which lines the inside of the belt and locks into place once engaged in the buckle. The mechanism is then disengaged with a little release lever. This system provides you with a perfect fit every time. You're no longer restricted to using punched holes every 1/4" or more apart.

This particular belt is defaulted to 48". The inside ratchet rail is probably about 8-12 inches in length. My husband is a 40" waist and the belt fits fine. Any excess belt through the buckle is slid through the belt loop. The website mentions that you can cut the belt to length, but I wouldn't suggest this. There's also mention that if a comment is placed on the order, that they can be custom made but I didn't use this option so I cannot speak to it.

The belt does appear to be made out of good quality leather. The buckle is a bit heavy, but well built.

I received this belt at a discounted price in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.

I ordered this on August 14th, and the delivery date was scheduled to be September 11th, at the very earliest. It was a big surprise when I received it today, August 24th! It came in a basic yellow envelope-like package, and was bubble-wrapped inside of it very well. I could have dropped the package off a building and it would come out without a scratch.

The watch itself is nicely made, mine has was looks somewhat like an air bubble on one of the wings of the triforce, but it isn't noticeable and I don't think it detracts from the overall beauty of the watch itself. Changing the time is easy, just gently pull on the top pin and rotate it to the correct time. I've been checking it throughout the day and it is keeping time perfectly.

My only discrepancy is that I feel the chain it came on isn't very strong. This isn't a problem, and it can be used for everyday use. I would like to specify that it is a rather long necklace. I am 5'4" and when wearing it, the pocket watch rests just above my bellybutton.

reviewText: I ordered this jacket to wear to a 5K I was running when the weather report turned to rain. It wasn't a downpour, but a steady drizzle and the jacket did keep me dry. My big complaint with this jacket is the three zippers.....two nice big zippered pockets, and the front zipper which I thought would be more convenient than a pullover. EVERY ZIPPER got snagged on some fabric and got stuck. After the first one, I was very conscious to be careful zipping or unzipping, but they still got caught. I'm not sure how often I will use this jacket for that reason. It does fold down very small and store in its only little bag, so it would be nice for travel if I can figure out how to avoid the zipper issue.

Simply put, they are exactly what they say in the descriptions. The tint is a very, very lite mirrored Blue, but not overwhelming to the point of  looking cheap ( if you know what I mean) if another person were standing in front of you they would be able to see your eyes thru the beautiful lit blueish tint. Looking thru the glasses you will get a grayish lite (very lite) greenish visual picture. Which is just the right amount of tint to remove bright glare. They speak more to Fashion than a pair of hard core dark sunglasses that you would use while on a boat or fishing.
They really look good on men and they add a hint of class to any ensomble say jeans and a nice button up or pull-over.

Finally: the famous question of " How can a person tell if their Ray-Bans are fake or the real deal?"
This is how in a nutshell: On the Right side of your newly aquired Ray-Bans there will be the letters RB on the lens, usually in white ink, and on the left side there will also be an R & B but it will be " ETCHED" into the glass and you can actually feel it ever so slightly when you rub your finger or thumb over it. Also most Ray-Bans ( the good ones) are made in Italy and will say so along with the style number on th insides of the frames somewhere.
Hope this little review has in some way helped in your decision as to whether or not you purchase a good Quality pair of Ray-Bans!
Respectfully,
Jeff Mercer,
Mentor, Ohio 44060
"May Gods Blessings shine on all you do!"

I would recommend ordering a size up, especially if you are particularly 'busty'. I have small breasts, but still feel as if I could use more coverage. The bikini is very comfortable and flexible, and the picture is true to color. I would recommend hand washing this, and laying flat to dry, because I don't think the neoprene would be good to use heat on, it might permanently crease. But overall I think this was a good item, just size up on your order. :) I received this product at a discount in exchange for an honest review. All thoughts and opinions are 100% MY own and I never guarantee a 5 star review.

reviewText:
This LOUISE MAELYS Sexy Top Halter bikini is made with an awesome quality neoprene material. It's thick k and there will be no goodies seen through this bikini and I love that! So many these days are so thin that every thing can be seen through them and also making things visible that shouldn't be, like a camel toe, this one will not leave you like this. The color is absolutely adorable! It's a very nice baby blue color but with a little more bright and pigment to it than actual baby blue, I guess is how to describe it. Then it's outlined in black which really compliments it and adds that sexy touch. The straps are good and thick and stay tied.

My only complaint with this LOUISE MAELYS Sexy Top Halter bikini is that it is tiny. The sizing is a little off. I would definately order a size up. I am normally a 10 or some articles of clothing a size 12 and I ordered the size large which the size chart says a large is a 12-14. This is too small. reviewText:
I love this hat! I don't think it would work on the toddler crowd, but 8+ (or a larger 6-7 year old) should be fine.  The inside is very fuzzy and soft. The white is actually more of a warm ivory, which I think works better with most skin tones than a stark white would.

reviewText:
I have had this buckle for around 5 months. I ware it everyday and it has seen some ware. This buckle looks great with jeans and a t-shirt (Levis and American Apparel are my preference). This buckle gives a nice Celtic look to anything you ware and it fills the role of a belt buckle with our coming across as redneckish.

In summery:

Pros:

-Good looks

-Nice metal (pewter)

-Draw attention to your abs and pelvic area (this could be a con if your on the heavy side)

-Great way to show your heritage

Cons:

-Metal scratches (after long use it becomes so scratched that they really all just blend together. Plus it give it character.

Notes: If you are not used to belt buckles it takes some time they are heavier and can dig into you if you and other people if you get frisky with it on.

Also DO NOT swing it around it is a good bit of metal you got on there and it is quite capable of cracking tiles and heads.

Also if you drop your pant on a hard floor there will be a rather satisfactory CLANK.

At any rate I highly recommend the buckle to anyone looking for a nice piece of flair or just a hard working buckle.

Great bag, great service, great company.

I found this bag on the Spicer Bags website, but decided to buy it on Amazon.  It wasn't clear when I purchased it which strap (cotton or leather) this purse comes with.  It's leather! (I'm one of those annoying vegans and don't like leather)  I contacted Spicer Bags and they got back to me the next day, and sent me a cotton strap.  Unfortunately, even though I measured everything before purchasing, the purse is just slightly too small for my phone and sunglasses.  I already purchased the next size up from the Spicer Bags website and look forward to receiving it.

Pros
-Bag is crazy soft
-Bag looks just like the picture
-Bag appears to be very well constructed
-Zipper is smooth and sturdy
-All the reasons I bought it (made in USA, sustainable cork...)
-Company provided EXCELLENT customer service

Cons
-bag doesn't have much give and is a little smaller than I thought it would be but that reflects on me more than the bag itself
-this specific bag doesn't have any slots to hold credit cards.  again, this is probably something I misunderstood while shopping, but the slots would be a nice touch
-has a divider (fabric) in the center of the purse making two little sections.  again, this is more me than the purse, but I could have done without this divider
I thought the flower design was hiding a snap or button, but it didn't -- it's just superfluous.

reviewText:
The size guide is helpful in a lot of ways, but unfortunately strap length is not listed. All five of my bridesmaids ordered this dress for my wedding and the dresses looked beautiful, but almost all needed to be altered because of the bust coming up too high and the straps being too short.
The fabric is beautiful, and I adore the colors (we got Lila for the bridesmaids and grape for the maid of honor). Just keep on mind it will most likely need some additional work to get it fitting correctly.
It's also a little longer than expected, with most of my bridesmaids having it come down to mid calf, but they have all told me that they are comfortable and feel beautiful in their dresses which is the most important.
summary: All five of my bridesmaids ordered this dress for my wedding and the dresses looked beautiful, but almost all needed to be alter

I am a petite woman and most dresses that I have to buy have to come from the juniors section at local stores.  I ordered this in November on cyber Monday and got it almost a week before Christmas. (Fair warning it ships from China. That is something not in the details.) I was so excited since the majority of the reviews say it fits exactly how it says it will so this should be the dress that fits me for once! Well the day came I came home from work and it was here.  I hurriedly tried it on to find it was about 5 inches too big around every part of my body. Instead of this fitting a small like I expected, it was actually a medium. Biggest dissapointment of my week. It was just a plain green cotten fabric too. It looked so different from the picture.  This was NOT the dress i fell in love with online.
Fortunately it fits my niece and she loves it so it won't go to waste and I don't have to mess with returning it to China. But I will NEVER  buy this again. I will NOT recommend this to someone else. Biggest waste of my emotions and time and money.
Buy a size smaller if you can. I will sadly have to be the 25 year old going back to the juniors section to get cussed out by 14 year olds because I'm so small just to get a dress. So much for the Christmas dress this was going to be.
summary: Biggest dissapointment ever. Is waaaay too big.

reviewText: Great piece of men's jewelry with its stainless steel and leather combo and the fact that it has a magnetic closure, so it is easy on and easy off.  This is a great gift for a young man or teenage boy, as the size is not made for a guy with a large wrist or big frame.  It has a tough feel to it, so I don't see it wearing out quickly and should last with care for quite some time. It is eye catching and the stainless steel really looks more like silver against the black leather braiding. As a disclaimer, we received this product either for free or at a discount for our unbiased and totally honest review. In no way have we been compensated by this company for our honest review. We do recommend this product for your needs. We do give this product a Five star rating as we do think that it will keep meeting our needs for a very long time. We, too, do rely on reviews for our personal shopping experiences and this is why we give you our most accurate review possible. If we do see in the future that this does fail or hold up to its claims, we will immediately update our review and star rating. Please, if our review was helpful in any part of your decision to purchase or not to purchase this product, rate our review as "helpful" if this has helped you in any way. Because, by clicking helpful, this will also help us with our reviews! Thank you so very much!

ROMANCE JEWELRY Mens Leather Bracelet Stainless Steel Magnetic Buckle Bangle I was worried that what if this product looks cheap. NOPE. This is great looking fashion jewelry. Clasp was really nice and works very well. It was fit perfectly for my husband's wrist too. This bracelet measure almost about 8", it's made of a thick, wide leather that has what looks like a gold swivel strip braided into the center of the leather stretching out against the whole length of the leather bracelet. It has a unique clasp that is stainless steel that's easy to open and close, pretty easy to put on with one hand. The clasp opens and closes just by sliding it out from one of the sides. It has a magnet inside of it so once you close it, the magnets click together and have a pretty good connection so it's not falling off of you. Note: I received this product at a discount or free to allow me to test it, and the write a review based on the results of my test. I am not affiliated with this company and I never promise to provide a positive review when offered. I test the product thoroughly and do my best to provide detailed reviews to other Amazon customers so they may make informed decisions. If you find my review helpful please let me know by hitting the like button! Thank you for your time hope this helps with your decision!!

The item came in simple packaging, mainly in a plastic sealed bag. It would have been nice if the item came in a gift box or jewelry box as it is an accessory item. This kind of makes the product appear of lesser quality.
The bracelet that has silver stainless steel with black leather.  There is a strong smell to the bracelet so please be warned of that and is primarily due to the leather so if you don't like leather smell then this may not be suitable for you.
The bracelet fits a medium sized hand well. If you have thin wrists it may not fit you well unless you wear the bracelet higher. The bracelet appears to very sturdy and good quality and is not bulky with the right weight . There were no imperfections on the bracelet. Only time will tell if this is actually water resistant and good for everyday use. The buckle operates well and fits snugly due to the magnetic clasps. No matter how much force you shake your hand, the buckle will not separate. It is hard to get the buckle fastened but I think thats because I am not used to these types of clasps.

Overall, a pretty decent bracelet for the price and would look great with casual looks.

I received this item at a discount in exchange for my hones review and unbiased review for this item. I am in no way affiliated with the seller or product. I write reviews based on past experience with similar products. I hope you find this review helpful.

From his perspective they are "cool" and "comfortable".  My son has large athletic thighs and does not like anything restrictive around his legs (boxer briefs or tightie whities).  From my perspective here's what I have to say....

The quality is excellent.
The waist band, although elastic, does not rub, fold
over on itself or leave red marks.
The knitted cotton is super soft and has stretch, allowing plenty of room for a large thigh.
The stitching is great, I have no worries about it coming undone.
I have washed and dried them; no fading, no shrinkage, and the image on the back side did not wrinkle, crack, or stick to itself.

Overall, extremely happy with the purchase. I will definitely buy other styles as they come available in my sons size.
summary: You get what you pay for!

reviewText:
This dress is so beautiful.  I got the black and white, not the pink.  I am normally a 4 or 6 in dresses, but I'm very busty so I got an 8 based on the chest measurement.  It has a corseted back so while I probably could have gotten away with a 6, the 8 could be tightened enough around the waist to fit well.
It's also surprisingly comfortable, I don't have "armpit cleavage" (the bit of skin t hat hangs over the top of a bodice around the armpit on a lot of structured dresses, especially if you're in your 30's and used to be obese... lots of loose skin), and I felt so pretty when I put it on.
I'm 5'10" and this dress came to my knees.  I would guess it would be more of a calf-length on a shorter person.

reviewText:
When I first put it on it seemed somewhat small, but only in the neck area; (I have a 7" hat size (177.8 mm) which I rather liked, because when I got it on all the way, the hood area was quite large. I really like that, because it means that it'll be tight around my neck, not allowing the wind to get in, and covering my neck at the same time! I couldn't help trying it out, and went outside in 45 Fahrenheit (7.2 Celsius) weather, just for a walk around the block, and LOVED it! (I'll bet it'll be comfortable in even colder weather, though!) I also drive a bicycle, and REALLY want to try it on there, AND when going down a hill, (and around here, they get pretty steep!) [sounds great, huh?] In that instance, the extra warmth should be a welcome addition! I also wear ski goggles when it's really cold, (for which I've had people call me 'Darth Vader') because the wind will make your eyes water when it gets that cold! I will update this review when I get a chance to use this balaclava, as it's been warm here, lately! (In the middle of November?! C'mon!)

(UPDATE 12-4-2015) I FINALLY got the chance that I have been long awaiting, and it was (sadly) bittersweet. I found that it IS quite wind-resistant, AND warm in cold temperatures, (it was 35 Fahrenheit, or 1.6 Celsius) however, for riding ANYTHING where you need peripheral (side) vision, it is completely lacking. Once you have the hood on, it will keep the wind or cold from bothering you, but when I go for a ride on my bicycle, I like to have the peripheral vision I told you about earlier, and anyone who rides a bicycle, motorcycle, snowmobile, ATV, etc. can understand what I mean here. That's why I can recommend this balaclava for people who walk to where they're going, (or as part of a health regimen) but if you use any kind of vehicle, 4 or 2 wheel, (or one with a track and skis) I must sadly ask you to search elsewhere, because this most likely won't help. I REALLY wanted to use this balaclava for cycling, too! I'm only removing one star though, since otherwise, it's a great balaclava!

*This product was provided to me at a discount in exchange for a fair and unbiased review*
summary: A great balaclava and seems very warm, so far... (UPDATED)

reviewText: It wasn't what I expected
Everyone wants to know where I got it and loved the embroidery.

I ordered this apron Customizable Embroidered Full Length Apron with Pockets - OSFA - Washed Denim by Swagge as a gift for my husband. He loves to barbecue and I thought it would be a nice touch to encourage him to cook even more often (hes a great cook!). He knew the apron was coming but did not see the sample or really know what to expect. From the minute he opened the package he has been tickled pink about the apron being customized with his name! The apron is light denim washed blue in color. It is a soft, light weight denim. He is 6 tall and fairly large boned, broad shouldered, plus sized; so I was not sure if the apron would fit. Happily the apron does fit (see attached image 1) although the ties are not very long (see attached image 5). Personally, it seems to me like the ties could be quite a bit longer but at least they fit (image 5) and he is not complaining at all. He also made sure that I knew that the apron was very comfortable to wear and he felt like it fit him perfectly. As you can see in the attached image 2, the apron has (2) generous pockets in the front, which my husband loves. He barbecues a lot at night or after dark and he really likes having the pockets to carry his flashlights in. The apron is also fairly long (images 1, 2 & 3), goes almost to his knees. Since he is 6 foot tall, he and I both agree that the length is perfect on him! The attached image 4 and 8 shows the beautiful customization of his name. The customization, I noted while ordering, centers any writing you choose. Image 6 shows the inside of the top of the apron, with the company Port Authority on the label. Image 7 shows the other tags inside of the apron 100% cotton. Made in China. Machine wash cold. Use mild detergent. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low heat. Do not dry clean. I admit that I have not washed the apron yet but when I do I will wash it on a delicate load and just hang it up to dry. It shouldnt take the apron very long to dry. I have not spoken to the seller, though, and I do not know if they use the same exact aprons for every order, or not. This may or may not change. When you go to place the order, you are given many different options: 1) Fonts: Brush Script (the font I chose); Graffiti; Old English and College. Hint: If you type in the name you want in Embroidery Line 1 you can go back up on the page and change the fonts to see how each font will look on the apron. A very nice little option! 2) Font Colors: The options offer (6) different colors (white, red, black, blue, green and yellow). Hint: If you have a name or statement entered in Embroidery Line 1, 2 or 3 in the sample image on the left will also show the font you picked in the color that you choose. 3) Embroidery Lines: Embroidery Line 1: Allows 12 characters Embroidery Line 2: Allows 15 characters Embroidery Line 3: Allows 12 characters As far as I could tell, it appears that all of the options are included in the price and there are no extra fees for picking any of the options. I must admit that I was very surprised at how many options were given, including 3 lines of possibly embroidery! Thank you for creating a beautiful customized apron at a very reasonable price, it made an amazing gift for my husband! I would highly recommend this apron as a gift, especially with the holiday season coming up. Also, thank you for taking the time to read my review, I hope we have answered any questions you may have had about this product! Have a blessed day! Sincerely, (Mr. &) Mrs. Jr. Swagge Customizable Embroidered Full Length Apron with Pockets - OSFA - Washed Denim

reviewText:
Thrilled with these...

I've had my eye patch 2 glasses for 5 years or so. The frame color was the grey iridium polarized or w/e. The frames are still in great shape, but the lenses were getting pretty beat up, particularly from biking. Last weekend my infant son decided to crawl across a stone patio while holding these, and the left lens was no more haha.

Read some reviews, ordered these Monday afternoon. I've had very bad luck with after market lenses for various glasses over the years, so was hesitant to not just give up an entirely new pair. They usually don't fit correctly and/or have very obvious distortion problems. These oakley's were discontinued years ago, though, and I've always loved the fit of them. Package arrived today, and am very impressed. They snap into the frames perfectly. I bought the red lenses only to trick myself into thinking I bought brand new glasses overall. The light that comes through is very slightly brighter, but I actually prefer that because the original lenses were dark enough to get annoying in certain conditions. The package includes some cleaning solution, some care instructions, and an extra cleaning clothe to throw in the original bag.

These were not included with prime shipping, but the shipping was still free...I was given a delivery window from Aug. 26th to 31st, package was at my front door early the 25th (today).

I'd highly recommend these as well as anything from the seller. Product matches the description exactly. Definitely considering buying another set in a different color just as back ups.
summary: The frames are still in great shape, but the lenses were getting pretty beat ...

reviewText: This is cute! Order one size up if curvy like me. The cups are lightly padded, not heavily so. Store carefully so you don't squish them, and it's best washed in a garment bag on a delicate cycle, then hung to dry. That will help it retain its color and shape, as well as protect the lace. The color is gorgeous, the price is great, and it arrived quickly. What I really loved though, was the customer service. They were so sweet, fast to reply, and a just all around nice people. They accidentally sent me two when I only ordered one. When I contacted them about it, they told me to keep it as their gift to me. How many companies do that these days? Thanks, folks at Pink Queen! You just assured a return customer, and since I am also a vocal one, I will recommend you to others! Customer service and getting the item I paid for are my key concerns when buying a product. You have both. You will be one of the first companies I look to for lingerie. Fellow buyers, skip expensive stores. This product does what it's supposed to at a reasonable cost.

Pros and Cons

Cons
1. Interior color-- I think this item would be much more successfull if they chose a more neutral interior to contrast with the dark brown leatherette exterior-- the russet-brown isn't a deal breaker, but it definitely looks specifically masculine than neutral...
2. more of a gripe than a 'con' per'se... Depending upon where you buy this there may be some inconsistencies in
quality of workmanship-- so don't buy this on Ebay or other auction sites--you won't get a necessarily new one, or possibly
you'll get a 'defective' item..--

Pros
1. It looks even better in person than in photos. The clear top is sleek and elegant and the simple design looks
 elegant without being overdone and it still looks nice displayed with other case/pieces.. I left the protective film on the glass to prevent scratches.
2. The interior storage is amazing! The key-lock hidden/stacked storage design drawer inside is safer and a better design
 than the cases where only part of the case locks and the rest is unlocked or open-- so you will feel more secure knowing that everything you put in this case will be securely 'locked' -- Especially if you have holiday or cocktail events and nosy visitors decide to give themselves
an unauthorized tour of off-limit spaces...
3. Easy to store. The design makes it easy to stack and store as needed. the simple design will blend
well with more vintage pieces in the same dark brown family--
4. The price- Comparing prices will definitely ensure a great deal-- i think at the time Amazon had this item on-sale for the lowest price (and they still might be lowest, currently ) and with a gift-coupon and free shipping it was even cheaper!

Overall this is a keeper and great piece to add to any jewelry keepsake collection!
Our grade: Solid B; or 4Stars!
summary: I {{Like}} The Ikee Design Wooden/Leatherette Locking  Watch Case -- Grade: Solid B or 4 Stars!!

reviewText: So if your like me you might be thinking "It can't be that bad" or "I can make it work" after reading the reviews. Just save your money. It's literally a shirt with a crotch added. There is no added length for the fact that your lady parts aren't located an inch under your belly button. Mine aren't anyways. I thought it might fit since I don't have a very long torso but it's just not made properly. I'm 5'1 107 lbs. The length for a small is supposed to be 75cm/29.5in but instead they measure 65cm/25.5in, those missing 4 inches are definitely the cause of this very uncomfortable wedgie. Extra fabric bunches up right above the super wedgie since it's wider up top and so short in length. I really wanted it to fit like the blue one I seen in another review with 5 stars but it's obviously a completely different one since mine has plastic buttons instead of the metal ones she has on hers. reviewText: So I'm giving it 4 stars for right now. Because I haven't worn it long enough & I obviously haven't washed it yet either. I actually really like this product. The package arrived wayyy before the delivery date I was given ( by like a month) & the package arrived undamaged. The shirt itself was soft to touch & very soft on my skin. It fit literally exactly as shown. I have the thick thighs & big butt. & I'm petite. I orderd a large & it fit perfectly. As it being to tight around the thighs for some women.. I think this particular shirt is made for the right size thighs. So if yours are bigger then average, then it might be uncomfortable for you. & if your super skinny & not as curvy, the shirt won't fit exactly how you want it to. As for the buttons, many reviews said they popped off & ripped instantly... Mine did not. The shirt isn't thick material. So when your snapping of the buttons, don't literally rip them off. I also read that a bracelet was supposed to be included as well. I did not receive one. Overall I'm happy with this purchase.  Just an fyi:if your taller then 5 ft I would try a size bigger might fit better. But I honestly think this shirt was made for little people (like me ) & I love it.

Why is it okay for these sellers to say "TURQUOISE?" I'm just so surprised they get away with it. These are not turquoise. Not even fake turquoise. That I understand, but there is nothing about these earrings that are any kind of turquoise. These earrings are "Plastic" and we should have the right to not only know this, but to speak about it as well. I know now that "Alloy" is not good for you. I should have checked earlier, but I was having so much fun getting all this inexpensive jewelry. I do not believe this will be posted, but I will discuss it because it is important. This is false advertising. Don't get me wrong I love Amazon. It has been extremely important to me. So these earrings are not going to be warn, because of the plastic. The alloy that I have bought will be warn with a Jewelry Protected product , but I will stay away from it when all my packages get here. The product doesn't work well enough. Please just check and read about your metals. And this is shameful that the sellers get away with this. It's not ok that this isn't even fake turquoise. And it usually costs too much and is too much of a hassle to send them back. I understand you get what you pay for, but I paid for fake turquoise. Thank you for reading...

reviewText: Fast delivery,  Accurate description,

I had a pair of Warmen gloves that I loved, so I was really upset when I lost them.  I decided to replace them with this touchscreen pair, which turned out to be even better than the original.  The leather is soft and beautiful. I ordered the blue, which is a lovely bright navy.  The touchscreen fingers do work on the phone, although typing is not optimal.  They keep my hands warm down to about 30 degrees.  Any colder, and I recommend adding a glove liner.

The only thing I would note is that this style has a tight wrist, which makes them difficult to get on at first.  The leather does stretch, so after a week or so, I no longer had a problem getting them on, but someone with large/wide hands might have trouble.  There is another Warmen pair with a different style wrist (without the buttons) and I'd recommend that one for people with bigger hands.

This has everything I needed for my driving gloves.  The leather has kept my hands dry, the lining has kept my hands warm.  I took other's advice and ordered a size up (I have small hands).  Fit nice and snug.  The grip is great on the wheel, no sliding!  The only problems I can note is when they get wet, they turn black (purchased in blue) until the dry. Very disconcerting the first time! Also, if it is zero with a -10 windchill, yes your hands will still be as cold as the rest of you.  But other than those they are stylish and a great deal!

reviewText:
Overall, it did look nice when I received it. But I had to return it due to fitment issues. I wear size 34 pants. I did order the size that claims to fit 32-34 inch waists. And, that size should have fit without issue. Afterall, it did state the belt length being 43 inches long and when comparing the belt length of my other belts, my other belts have a length of 42 inches. Which puzzles me as to why this one did not fit if it states the belt length being 43 inches long. I do not know if it is because it is China made (yes, it is -- you will see if you purchase it; the packaging shows it). And I have bought a China made belt about 2 years ago and that fit perfectly. Maybe the sizing charts are different for the conversions? I would recommend buying one or two sizes up just to make sure it will fit.

I ended up purchasing a different belt and I hope I chose the correct size this time.

I have 3 of these shirts, two long and one short sleeve.

NICE...  I love these sunglasses.  They come with an insert for prescription lenses that you can easily send in to www.eyeglassdirect.com or www.replacementlensexpress.com.  The only issue is that the inserts can break easily if the lenses fit too tightly while snapping them in.  I ordered extras, in different colors for this reason and also for extra outer lenses as they do get scratched up over time.  I give it 5 stars anyway, simply because years ago Bolles' or Oakleys cost  a fortune if you needed prescription lenses.  I couldn't afford the $450 Oakley set so I settled for the $300 Bolles'... The Oakley lenses were specially made with the prescription lenses permanently set into the outer lens, while the Bolles' came with an insert.  This product is quite similar to the Bolles' I purchased years ago when I was a bicycle courier in Washington D.C.  The biggest difference is that these only cost $20.00 and you can get prescription lenses made for $25.00 a pair for single vision.  $45.00 is way better than $300-$450.
Love these glasses!!! Particularly appreciate you can mount reading glasses in them. Use them for cycling and they do a fantastic job providing a clear wind free perspective
summary: Would buy them again in a heartbeat

reviewText:
Okay, here is the scoop. The bag is perfect in size, and colors are awesome. Here is what I did find that I didn't really like. I LOVE handbags! I know what a bucket with draw strings is supposed to be like. The rope that's not really rope they had on the bag is like 5-6 inches too short. Makes it so u cant open the bag fully. Secondly, I had not noticed this before, but there are NO pockets on or in this bag. I had a couple of organizers that I haven't used in years, because all my other bags have a lot of pockets in them; I pulled them out to fix the problem. Then, I really had to fix the opening problem cause if I didn't the opening would drive me nuts and I would end up getting rid of it. So, I found one of my scarves that have the same colors on it and threaded them through. I took the plastic, rope/cord and tassels off and used the scarf. Not only did this fix the problem, but it made it look REALLY cute!  As soon as I get my hot glue gun out and attach the organizer to the inside, this bag is good to go.
I gave it a four out of five stars cause, I do like the bag, the other star was just out of range considering its a DIY special.
summary: The bag is perfect in size

I got my son who is 18 months old and 21 pounds the size 18 to 24 months and it fits him exactly as I expected just a tiny bit big with room to grow.  unfortunately by the end of the first day of him wearing it and diaper changes two of the crotch snaps had gave out. Since I have a snap press I have decided I will just replace the snaps myself. I think it's so cute I just don't want to even send it back.

The pros to this 1 piece romper.
1. It is adorable!  This style is very in right now and with good reason, it is so beyond CUTE!
2. The disigns on it is printed really well.  I expect it will hold up a long time.
3. The pant legs are Harem cut!  This is so cute!
4. Fits over bulky cloth diapers.  Being Harem cut this fits over our bulkiest cloth daipers.
5. It so far has been washed 2 times and the fabric still looks fantastic.

The cons to this 1 piece romper.
1. The snaps on the one I got were not pressed on very well and 2 of them came loose the 1st day my son wore this.  I think I just got a one...

Overall I really like this romper, I will be fixing the snaps with my snap press and keeping it.  I would recommend it to others but advise they give the snaps a good testing right away so they can return it if they need to. I received this product at a discount exchange for my honest unbiased review I'm in no way obligated to give a good review on the products I receive to test.

I got this outfit for my little one and the expression on it makes perfect sense for him its a giant X that has No Sleep printed inside of it and well that is him to a "T" on most nights.

The tag on the outfit says it is size 90 and is Baby Ball brand. There is nothing about what the materials are or care procedures like you see on allot of clothing tags. The material is nice it doesn't feel cheap and the graphic is printed on the cloth so it doesn't feel rough or anything either. The stitching is also well done with there being no fly-a-ways or tears in the fabric. When I pulled on the romper non of the stitching popped or stretched which I always take as a good sign. The legs are closed with snaps and they lay flat and are smooth so they won't irritate at all. The material around the sleeves, neck and ankles is stretchy.

When Alexander was crawling around and playing in it he seemed to be able to move easily as usual except for when he tried to clap his hands or wave them then the sleeves would cover his hands. It is supposed to be for 18-24 months is what a size 90 equals out to right now my son wears 18month shirts but this was quite big on him but he has plenty of time to grow into it. He did end up getting a little to warm in it so we had to take it off but that just means it will be great for when the fall and the coming winter roll back around. The gray color is a little light so I think I would have liked it better if the cloth was a dark gray but that is a personal preference. Overall I like this little outfit and my son seemed comfortable in it which is always a plus.

Today I am reviewing the dollger sunglasses
The item arrived fast and was well packaged.  I got the gold tone sunglasses.  They come in a very nice semi hard black glasses case.  Within the case is on cleaning cloth and one fabric glasses carrier.  The case itself is very nice and has one side the can clip onto your purse or pants or any bag.  The only issue I had with the case is that the strap broke off so I couldn't use the strap.  The glasses themselves are nice and big, the lenses shade out a lot of the sun.  Though the ends of the glasses, the part that goes back by the ear, was a little sharp and tended to dig in.  I am sure you can just sand it a little or maybe it was just my pair that had that issue but it's something that I wanted to mention anyway.
I received this item at a discount or free for my honest and unbiased review.  Iam in no way, shape, or form affiliated with the seller or maker of this product.  This review is 100 percent my own and is based off of my own personal experience with the product.
summary: Neat sunglasses good for trips to the beach

reviewText: Love them.

I have 2 pair of the Dollger Clubmasters now, the gunmetal and the gold. Very impressed with the quality of both, nice and sturdy. The hard cases are great too. The gunmetal ones are my favorite and I get lots of compliments. The gold ones are a little too flashy for me, but they are fun to wear sometimes. My Daughter likes to wear them a lot! Well worth the price, and I will probably order other styles from Dollger in the future.

I received this product at a discounted price to review.  These glasses are so nice. They are made of an amazing material . They ate very well mad end are well worth the price. I am in love! They come with a nice hard case so you can just throw them in your purse and don't have to worry about them being crushed.  They have a 59s look to me and are just so cute. They come inside a soft case and have a cleaning cloth as well. My kids always try to take them from me but no t this time . Love love love!!

These sunglasses look higher end than most the ones I buy at fairs or the dollar tree. They even come with a nice hard zipped up case to keep them looking sharp, and a screwdriver kit encase some of the parts are loose or too tight for your face, you can unscrew and fix anything that would go wrong with these glasses! The only downside i would say to these glasses is i wish i would have gotten a different color, i received Gold frames and that is one of my least favorite colors.  However, i will say they really do help keep the sun out of your eyes on those super sunny days, when you walk into a house from being outside you really do notice just how darkly tented these glasses are, and that part i really love about them. I almost forgot these glasses even came with a microfiber cloth to help you clean them when they get dirty! Honestly i feel like they came with anything and everything you could possibly need with sunglasses! Wonderful product, i would recommend to any of my friends but maybe a different color than gold. I've reviewed this product for a free or discounted rate for my honest unbiased review.
summary: Comes with Everything you NEED! Great Quality

I'm often driving around with sunglasses on so I need good sunglasses. These look great (I went for the black lenses and silver frames), and are polarized, as promised. Though the lenses are black, when wearing the glasses, the view is not as dark as with other dark shades. I've worn them on bright, sunny days and was able to see very well. They fit nicely as well, and don't feel tight around my head and don't feel heavy on my ears. The nose pads are adjustable so you can adjust them to sit on your nose however you like.
The glasses came in a sturdy zip-up case, which included the glasses, a cloth pouch, lens wipe, and a mini key chain with a screwdriver on each end (one flat head and on Philips) and two mini socket wrenches. The nose pads were on tight but in case you need to tighten them, or even replace them, you can do so with the mini screwdrivers. Great sunglasses.
Disclaimer: I received this product for my honest and unbiased opinion.

I would definitely recommend these to anyone who wants a stylish pear of quality sunglasses! I have a thinner face, so some sunglasses seem too big on me, but not these! I was happy to find that out. Crew/Ann Taylor/Banana Republic, and have purchased (and kept) both a medium and a large in this top. Unless your hips are lile 200 inches... don't worry about that measurement. Follow the waist measurement and the chest.
I was skeptical about the peachy color, from the reviews i read but in all honesty, it goes perfect with my skin, my hair, and the black lace neutralizes it.
Be prepared to tailor the dress. I have a 36 inch bust...between a 34b/c cup and the chest part of the dress is stiff, not stretchy, so i going to have to take in on the shoulders, and maybe on the sides to shape up my chest. I am also super short so its no surprise there.
Like everone says, it is super long... but even when i go to macys or lord & taylor or some other store, dresses are always a mile long on me.
It is slightly see through so wear a skin tone color underwear or a slip. I haven't figured out which choice im going to go with.
For 35 dollars it is honestly a bargain... i have paid 100 more for dresses with less quality.

The dress fit pretty well (was slightly loose) and the material was wonderful, but the zipper was total trash. The pros

Material is nice, detail good, got what advertised.

The cons

Bulky fit, fabric felt hard at the chest and waist, not a good fit for my figure, not a good fit for my height.

My advice is try on dresses in a store and find out which style fits your body figure. Get fitted. Some stores fit you at no cost... Some. This was purchased as a gift for someone who loves both the color blue and houndstooth patterns.

One year later, and it is still worn regularly; more often than others of similar color and pattern, mostly because the alpaca wool is great at keeping warmth in and (at least this one) isn't coarse like some other natural wool fibers. The scarf hasn't frayed or lost color, but neither has it been washed or mishandled.

Also, I paid $50 in December 2015 so the price hasn't changed much.
summary: Alpaca my closet with these scarves

I received the Chicwe Womens Print Short Sleeve Turn-up Cuff Top T-shirt Plus Size M-4XL free or discounted for my review.
I am 140 to 145 pounds and have a 38DD chest and the size Medium fit me perfectly which was nice as I am used to having to get Large in tops most of the time.
I love the print and design of the top in purple.
The fabric is sheer, you may want to wear a tank under it - I am not in my photos but I am wearing a nude colored bra.
I have several items from Chicwe and each are made very well, good stitching, no loose threads, easy to wear and fun to style. This top would be super cute with anything from a black skirt, leggins, or skinny jeans. I think it would be so fun to wear for a girls night out!
This is a can't beat price top too - what fun - it looks like the exact styles I buy at my local boutique for 5 times the price!
Also reminds me of a style you would see at Buckle in the mall and if you do any shopping there you know how expensive they are!
Chicwe has become one of my favorite places to shop on Amazon and this top is a clear reason why.
While my photos are not too stylish you can at least see the fantastic print and I love the way the black bands dart through the pattern in an unexpected and unplanned way, just adds to the unique visual appear of this top.
The black slim line at neckline, and black banding around arms tie it all together completing the look.
One of my favorite additions to my wardrobe!
summary: Unique fashion is my favorite and Chicwe has it! Affordable too!

I like this top! It's a little baggy but not too much.

The fabric is thin and stretchy so this can be worn in the cold weather maybe with a tank underneath or summer time.

I like the length of the sleeve because I'm not a fan of showing off my arms most of the time.

The length is great also. Can be worn with leggings jeans.

I like that this is kind of like a casual top, great for work or going out.

Although I'm not in love with the way the fabric feels it's actually not bad once it's on.

I machine washed this in cold water and let it air dry. Didn't notice any changes in fabric or color. It's well made. Good stitch work.

So far, I'm liking the top paired with skinny jeans. No need for necklace if you don't want to since there's a nice design on the front.

Sample provided for my evaluation and honest review.
